1.content:
Okay, here we go. This "chapter" will be a launching pad for future storylines, so just pick a branch and get creating!

Will you create a atory about a kind anthro titaness who cares for her cute little pet?
Or a merciless tyrant who gleefully uses her puny human as a toy/seat cushion/punching bag for sadistic kicks?

And is it set in our world, where animals somehow evolved, grew, and enslaved humanity?
Or is it some other world, where humans were ALWAYS subserviant to anthro-kind?

All that and more is up to you!
Enjoy!

****(Branch 1's first add is reserved for me. Other authors CAN add to it subsequently, but the initial storyline is mine.)****
1.title: Let's get Started!

11.content:
The dawn light, always intrusive, was the first thing to wake you up as its rays washed over you through the window along with chittering birds outside. Cursing your light sleep habits, you turn over in your cot and try to curl under your sparse blankets; to hell with early rising.

...Too bad the welcome darkness and silence that brought were shattered by the second thing to wake you up--thunderous, booming rumble: a deep guttural hissing noise, like a freight train in a landslide. The ground and walls shook as the noise came in waves.

Blast it, Zafirah was snoring again.
Sighing, you throw off your covers and groggily walk through your minimally-furnished quarters, exiting onto your snoring alligator mistress’s bedside table.

Zafirah was a Titan, really--350 feet tall at the least, scales the color of rich coffee with a few yellow spots down her spine and tail with a tan underbelly. She had just a bit of pudge in her belly, cleavage and rear you could see even under her blankets, but her figure was otherwise quite toned. It was a figure she was quite proud of, though she’d gotten it from her mother.

You winced at the memory of the matriarch gator who’d given you to her daughter as a birthday gift. Even as gentle as Zafirah was, you were still her pet. Years ago, Earth had been invaded and conquered by a race of aliens who resembled giant anthropomorphic animals. You’d only been a kid when it happened; all the memories were fuzzy and distant. You could barely remember NOT living in a world where towering giants stomped about everywhere.

The aliens, simply calling themselves the “Anthro Imperium” had been surprisingly light conquerors. Earth had been ultimately made a sort of client state: humans given rights and protections as Imperial citizens, and mostly left alone as long as they paid taxes to their suzerian overlords.
Taxes and…other tribute.

The Anthros were quite predatory, even those resembling “benign” animals. They still enjoying toying with smaller beings, showing their dominance. Devouring “tinies” alive wasn’t unheard of, either. Thus was born the “Prey Tribute”--every year, Earth would hand over a crop of “undesirables” like criminals and terrorists to the Anthros to become…whatever their captives wanted them to be. Food, pets, toys; it never ended well, but in exchange for the Imperium’s benevolence it had been a good deal. Most of the victims were criminal scum anyway.

….Well, except for you. You’d only been in for some petty theft and vandalism, but the quota had had to be filled that year. You were slotted into the Tribute crop and sent off to your fate. You ended up in the hands of Zafirah’s mother: a black alligator woman who’d fought in the initial invasion, and had swallowed a platoon of tanks whole just because she could.

You could still remember what she’d said to you that day.
Little human, my daughter will simply adore you. Well, for your sake, I hope she does.”

You sigh again. At least you didn't end up eaten. She HAD sat on you a few times, though.
Zafirah’s snoring stops as she begins to rouse from her sleep...
11.title: MY Anthro (Reserved)

choices: Zafirah's parents, the gracious warriors who keep watch over mankind.
Zafirah's parents, the smug aristocrats who revel in their superiority!
Zafirah's parents, the fattest, most gluttonous anthros to ever live!
111.content:
"Snrk...Mnyeh..."

Then, unlike anything you'd expect from a giant predator, Zafirah blue away a frizzled lock of black hair as she reluctantly pushed herself away from the bed, scratching at her left breast with a filed claw. She didn't look fully awake even as she knelt upright, the blood clearly flowing into her head as she blinked away the sleepies in her eyes.

"Good morning, Zafirah!" You say loudly, yet formally, bowing to the bedridden gator.

At last, Zafirah's head tilts your way, eyes looking a lot more royal and benevolent as she smiles. "Good morning, pet. Have you slept well?"

"Yes, your majesty, I have!" You lie, not wanting to guilt her over your wakeup call. "You have as well, I suppose?"

"Good enough." She grunts, tossing the blankets aside to free up her legs.

The nightstand jitters slightly as her feet hit the floor, but as carefully as she can, she opens a hand and lays it down in front of you on the nightstand, inviting you on. Without hesitating, you clamber onto her palm, and she swiftly raises it up to her shoulder, and you climb on by some of her long, flowing hair.

You remain there, seated on her scaly shoulder as she goes through her usual morning routine, as you both'd done for almost every day. You're there as she brushes her teeth, combs her hair out, and even gets dressed, and the entire time, the only concern you have is looking down at her body as she takes off her nightgown, keeping your head up and your hands clamped over your eyes as she pulls a red r-shirt down over the two of you.

After a moment or two of no motion, you let yourself look in the mirror, at you and Zafirah's reflection. Again, unlike anybody whose parents were world-conquering warriors, she was dressed the part of any college kid, wearing only a pair of blue jeans, a shirt for some metal band--a human band from before the war, at that--and a pair of black-framed glasses sitting on the bridge of her maw, the legs are hidden beneath a head of nicely combed black hair.

Zafirah had her usual smile on as she pulled her neck up through the collar, but her lips soon pursed slightly as she laid eyes on herself, particularly a fluffy roundness that hung around underneath her shirt, letting a sliver of tan see the light of day.

"Hrm." She grumbled. She tugged her shirt down over the seam, but it easily rode back up.

"Something the matter, Zafirah?" You ask innocently.

Zafirah's eyes glance at you, casting that same pout, but it soon disappears as she rolls her eyes with a humored grin.

"No...nothing." Zafirah insists, tugging her shirt down again. "Nothing to fret over, at all."

"Well, I'm not fretting if you're not fretting." You reply, sitting back.

Zafira gently pets the back of your neck with a claw. "In fact, I think I feel easy enough that I'm having a large breakfast. Wouldn't you agree?"

"Certainly, madame. Lead the way!"

Striding with confidence, Zafirah leaves her room and goes down the hall. She goes down steps, passes the stained glass windows along the wide, empty corridors, and goes down some steps again, navigating around the twists and turns of the palace on the route towards the banquet hall.

After a few more turns on the ground floors, she comes to a set of wide, arching double doors that tower over even somebody of her height, and two armored guards on either side push them open, allowing her to step through. The scent of maple syrup and butter flood the air of the room as she makes herself known, and she walks along the long, long formation of tables along the center of the room, dead set on the very end, where the two of you join...
111.title: Continue this storylline

choices: Go to meet her friends, in the Anthro colony
Bum around the house a bit
1111.content:
No matter how many times you'd seen the dining room, the grandure always amazed you. The walls and floor were spotless, and cast from a gleaming white metal that looked sleek and inviting, and seemed to reflect the sunlight in such a way that every corner of the room seemed to be glowing (that metal didn't exist anywhere on Earth--the Anthros mined it en masse on their homeworld and built their ships from it; only now was it starting to be imported). The long tables, as big as stadiums to you, were also made from a sort of pitch-black marble that looked like solid shadows against the white room. There was even a hologram projector by the table's end--one of the Anthros' science fiction imports--by the counter; a small podium about hip-height for Zafirah, glowing blue but not projecting anything.

You felt yourself gulp when you say who was seated at the far end of the table. Two alligators, older and larger than your mistress and covered in black scales; wearing grey uniforms. Her parents, Kara and Tycho: veterans of Earth's conquest and the Anthro Imperium's appointed governors on Earth. They both perk up as Zafirah takes her seat, a fresh plate of pancakes already there.

Kara gives her daughter a fanged smile from across. Like Zafirah, she had a slim figure with just a bit of pudge in the chest and rear...and an athlete's muscles rippling under her uniform; every bit a warrior. "Still a hard sleeper, eh my daughter? For a moment I thought we'd have to pull you out of bed before your breakfast got cold." Her icy-blue eyes flicked to you and you flinch. "And be sure to save some scraps for your human; he needs to eat as well...even if his stomach can't hold as much as ours." Her forked tongue flicks out and licks at some stray syrup on her muzzle...you briefly imagine a tank and its crew going into her maw, and shudder.

As Zafirah reaches up a gentle claw to pet you, Tycho gives a low snort from his seat next to her. "Kara my dear, sometimes I think you enjoy our superior size too much." If his wife was built like a warrior, he had the figure of a stone wall: standing a head taller than his daughter, with broad shoulders, barrel-chested, and every muscle bulging even under his clothes. You'd heard he'd once picked up an oil tanker and swung it like a club during the war. "The humans may be tiny, but they're Imperium citizens now."

"And he's already afraid of you..." Zafirah mumbled, still petting you. "No need to keep scaring him...thanks, Father."


Kara gives a musical chuckle, her car-sized fangs showing. "Oh, dear; am I really that sinister? I guess I could behave better around the humans...alright, Zafirah. I'll try not to scare your human so much."

"Thanks, Mother," your mistress says as she lowers you to the table, by her plate. She lowers her head and nuzzles your form. "Sit tight, little guy. I'll save you some pancakes!"


After a filling breakfast, Zafirah and you....
1111.title: Gator Breakfast Buffet

12.content: Because I'm a fair guy, I'm thinking of giving people a choice of options to make their own giantesses of any species they see fit from the animal kingdom. Just remember to always leave options for extra people.
12.title: Pick an Anthro Mistress...

121.content:
You wake up to the sound of strange music filling the air. You grunt and then you look up in surprise because there are acres and acres of jungle in front of you. You hear the sounds of strange birds and then you see what looks like a chameleon sprint past the ground. You were in a jungle, there was no doubt about it. It looked like it was an African jungle or was at least near Africa. “How did I get her?” you ask. “I don’t remember booking a trip to Africa. Whoa!”

 You had to stop yourself as you almost land in a large hole. From the looks of it, the hole was the same size as an elephant. “That was close.” You say. But then you look closer at the hole and you’re even more confused than you were before because the hole looked like a giant foot with long elongated toes like some kind of weird animal. You step back and then you hear a strange sound and look down and from what you see, you nearly stepped on a strange long-nosed hedgehog-like animal with short quilled yellow and black fur. You look closer as the creature scurries away and then you realize something. You remembered seeing an animal like that in a brochure of the travel bureau that you worked. It was called a tenrec and the only part of the world you knew where tenrecs were indigenous was Madagascar.

“I’m in Madagascar?!” you yell. “How did I get all the way out here!” You run out and try to figure out what’s going on and then you grunt as you trip on a piece of metal. You groan and then you see that the piece of metal you tripped on appeared to be a propellor for some sort of plane. You then look up at several trees and see the remains of a plane of some sort. It wasn’t a large airliner and seemed to be a plane that was left over from some kind of war. That was when there’s a rolling sound and you see a glass canister of some kind at your feet and it’s fogged and stained as if there was some odd concoction inside of it. You lift up the glass and stare at it in curiosity before you hear loud rumblings. “Oh great. Now I have to deal with earthquakes?!” The earthquakes get closer and closer and you hear the call of some kind of strange and unusual animal. You’re now more afraid than ever. You then look up and approaching your area is a strange creature shadowed out by the night’s sky but with glowing eyes. It was the size and shape of a mountain as it approaches.

You scream and try to run but the creature reveals that it has rather large rounded ears to go with its large eyes and it stomps forward after you, knocking down several trees in the process. The creature chirps and then leaps over the jungle with surprising grace given its incredible mass and lands with a loud boom that cracks the ground. You bump into something fleshy and fuzzy and then you look up in pure surprise. Standing in front of you was a giant woman, a rather obese giant woman, you’d say 600ft tall. But the most surprising part was that this giant woman was in no way human. She was a giant and obese aye-aye (a type of lemur) with dark pitch black fur and purple markings over her body. She wore nothing but a blue loincloth and tanktop as she looked down on you with an eerie smirk.

“Well, well, well,” says the aye-aye as she bend over to get a good look at you, her massive body casting a large shadow. “A human. I know exactly what to do with you.” You look up in fear as the aye-aye smiles down on you and decides your fate.
121.title: Aye to Aye

1212.content:
It was a peaceful lazy friday and you decided to go camping in the woods. Along the way, you passed a sign that you couldn't read very clearly due to the moss that was growing all over it. You try to make out the writing but it was in some kind of language that you didn't understand, so you shrugged your shoulders and walked away. All you saw near the sign were what looked like rabbit tracks and then you see some wild carrots. You pick one and then you look in surprise because the carrot looks normal from the outside but underneath the ground, it is striped purple, green and yellow. "Huh," you say. "It must be some kind of hybrid plant." You walk away, not paying any heed to what you had discovered. After that, the entire day goes along peacefully. To your delight, you only see rabbits and they don't even bother giving you a second thought as you pitch your tent and then later set up campfire. It is a rather uneventful camping trip and after the campfire dinner, you decide to turn in.

But the night soon proves itself to be a lot more eventful than the day because things start to get rather weird. You hear a strange jumping sound that awakens you from your tent. You look around and see nothing but the forest around you and some mushrooms that appear to be growing on the ground near your sleeping bag. You look to your watch and see that it's only 2:00 a.m. You then hear a strange whistling sound and gasp as you get up and run out of the tent to see that there is a strange red light coming from the woods. You grumble and then grab your flashlight. "Why did I decide to go camping this weekend?" you ask yourself. You walk closer and closer into the woods and see that the light appears to be coming from fluorescent mushrooms in the shape of what appears to be a fairy ring. "Huh," you say. "Just some mushrooms. Wait. That's a rather big fairy ring."

You walk closer to investigate and in the center of the mushrooms there is what looks like a huge hole in the ground. "What is this?" you ask. "It looks like a rabbit hole but it's way too big to be any rabbit I know." You bend down to take a closer look and the ground then starts to give in underneath you as you let out a loud scream and drop your flashlight as it shatters. You plummet deep into the ground but then you start to fall slowly and look around to see more of those strange mushrooms glowing in the walls. You then see what look like gears wedged into the walls of the dirt and strange paintings, one of which even depicts what looks like the Mona Lisa but made out of checkers and with what look like rabbit ears. "Huh?" you ask.

As you continue to fall, you see stairways that seem to lead to nowhere and some stairways seem to even be upside down. You then pass by platforms with chairs and tables that are as big as castles and then you finally land on a checkered floor and look around. From the looks of it, you landed in the middle of a hallway filled with strange horticulture sculptures decorated with flowers in every color of the rainbow. "Okay," you say to yourself. "This camping trip just got weird."

It was about to get weirder because at that moment, there is a loud thunderous earthquake that knocks you on your feet. "What the?!" There is then another earthquake and another, each one more enormous and loud than the last. The pattern in which the earthquakes take place makes you for a second believe that the earthquakes were bouncing, but that couldn't be possible could it. Then, you see a large shadow cast over you but before you can say anything about the shadow, something enormous lands in front of you with the biggest quake yet.

Once the dust clears, you look up and see something that amazes you. It was an enormous white rabbit that stood 800ft tall. This rabbit was very fat and plump, especially in the stomach and in the behind and the rabbit's big and round cotton tail was the same size as a wrecking ball. Then you look closer and see that this is a female white rabbit and the giant bunny has a human-like shape. She has long blonde hair that is worn in a large regal looking bun, a large ruffled collar and a blue vest with checkered lines at the sides with buttons that are shaped like hearts, much like the rubies in the tiara she was wearing. "That's a big rabbit." You think to yourself.

The rabbit then twitches her whiskers and then looks down at you with a scowl. "You're late." She says. You gasp. "She talked?!" The rabbit puts her hands on her hips and taps one of her large car crushing feet, creating small quakes as she continues to glare down at you. "Do not change the subject, human. I expected you here an hour ago. One must not keep one's mistress waiting." "Mistress?" you ask. The rabbit then starts to turn around and you see her enormous tail right in front of you. You begin to wonder why she was wearing a vest but not bothering with pants?

"You must be punished for disobedience, one hour under my posterior should suffice." You let out a yell and try to run but in a second the bunny giantess sits right down on you and all you can see is her white fur as you grumble and she smirks and makes herself comfortable as she drinks a cup of tea. You could tell this crazy night was only getting started.
1212.title: Down the Rabbit Hole

1213.content:
You wake up to the sound of stomping hooves and then you spring up out of your bed (actually a giant scarf) and look to the side to see the clock on top of the jukebox and that it was only 4 in the morning. It hadn’t even rung yet. You let out a sigh. “I should’ve known,” you say. “There must be a major wave this morning. She’s always up to catch the tide. You look around the workshop to see several surfboards. Some of which were already finished while some were only painted half-way and there was one that was still being carved. Of course, given how lazy your mistress was at times, you were surprised that she even got any work done. When she wasn’t slacking off, she was busy surfing and she usually dragged you along.

The only consolation was that compared to some other creatures that visited the beach, she was a very decent creature to be owned by. The world you lived in was a distant world where anthropomorphic animals, bigger than the likes of Godzilla or King Kong, were in charge and what little humans there were that lived on this planet- you suspected that they were descended from astronauts unfortunate enough to land on this planet stuck in the 60s - were subordinate to the giants that ruled the world. You had previously served under a rather nasty titaness who saw you as little more than vermin and actually attempted to stomp on you a few times just to have a good laugh at your expense. You still see that woman in your nightmares.

Eventually however, she grew bored of torturing you and gave you to her daughter. She had considered eating you but humans didn’t sit well in her stomach for some reason. Said daughter, you’d suspect was in her mid 20s. Her name was Sabrina and she was an 800ft tall okapi with bright white and brown stripes all over her body and long blonde hair with several flowers wrapped into it. She was a rather fat okapi with a chubby face, but most of her weight went into her enormous thighs and backside. In fact, she was so heavy that you knew she was coming a mile away. Sabrina didn’t usually get up this early but when there was a large wave to be caught, she’d be there. Sabrina lived on the beach (specifically, she lived on the end of a jetty) and she made her living building surfboards for other beach going giants.

However, a more accurate description of her job was that she did at a maximum 25% of the work. Carving a little and making the design ideas, but you were the one who did the bulk of the action since she put more of her effort into surfing than she did her job and relied on you to do everything within reason. You didn’t like how lazy Sabrina could be, but then again, she was a major improvement over her mom and you knew better than to complain. After all, she was still MUCH bigger than you.

You turn around and see Sabrina’s large shadow yawning on the wall. The enormous okapi walks in with her messy hair covering her face and horns, her long neck drooping and her mouth wide open with her long, pierced tongue sticking out. “Ugh,” says the giantess before she gives a slight belch. “I hate mornings. Now, where is that human of mine.” You let out a sigh and stand up as Sabrina staggers into the room. “Even when she decides to get up early for her own plans, she’s as lazy as ever. Well, I better let her know I’m here before she sits on me again. Sabrina! Over here! Sabrina!” Sabrina walks in and lets out a yawn, giving you a direct hit of her morning breath that makes you gag and hold your face. This was going to be one of those days. You just knew it.
1213.title: Okapi That

12131.content:
Sabrina let out another yawn before she sat down on a stool and caused it to break underneath her weight, causing her to fall flat on her back. "Ow." Muttered your okapi owner. You shake your head. Sometimes you wonder why you bother sticking around. Sabrina made it very hard for you to fear her. She scratches her chin as she attempts to hang on. "Oh man," mutters the okapi. "I need to get more sleep. Ugh. Major wipeout. Something must've happened to me on that last wave last night." Sabrina then lets out a hiccup and then her eyes begin to spin. "Uh," she says. "What were we supposed to be doing today?"

You give a grunt and then you point to the clock. Sabrina sees how early it is and then lets out a moan. "Oh come on," mutters Sabrina. "It's too early. Why do we have to open shop now." "Sabrina!" you yell to the ginormous okapi. "This was all your idea to begin with." Sabrina lets out another yawn and then snorts. "Oh come on," mutters Sabrina. "I get up early so I can surf, not so I can work. Man, what was I thinking when I decided to open up a surfboard shop. Oh well. Better get to work."

Sabrina picks you up and then the okapi drags you to her workbench. As she does so, you look at several surfboards all lined up. There was one that was painted to look like a catfish, one that was painted with the colors of a sunset, a surfboard that was split colored green and red and even one that looked like it was decorated with binary code. You have to admit, Sabrina had some good ideas. It's too bad that most of the time, you were the one who actually had to carry them out since she was too lazy to finish them. But then you think to yourself. "Maybe this time, things will be different."

Sure enough, Sabrina starts to carve a surfboard and is whistling a tune as she works the knife and you sit on the front of the unfinished board. Surprisingly, the lazy okapi is actually doing a terrific job and is humming to herself as she files the edges. You drop your jaw because from the looks of it, Sabrina had managed to get the general shape of the surfboard in one sitting without slacking off. She was now getting ready to paint it. As Sabrina puts her mind to paint, she decided to paint it bright black. She starts to paint the corner and then she lets out a yawn.

The next thing the giantess does is kick her feet up on the board and then start to snore rather loudly. You give a groan because then Sabrina's eye opens and she looks at you. "Well?" she asks. "What are you waiting for?" You give a moan. You really should not have expected anything more from somebody whose true calling appears to be being nothing more than a lazy bum who relies on somebody much smaller than her to get things done. "You know, Sabrina," you say. "You really can't expect me to paint this entire surfboard." Sabrina rolls her eyes. "Would you rather I send you back to my mom?" You give a gulp and shake our head. Sabrina may be lazy, but her mom was downright cruel and sadistic. Without another complain, you take Sabrina's brush and paint like you've never painted before.

2 hours later, Sabrina is fast asleep and you're exhausted but you've finally finished the surfboard and painted it to look like a black and white checkerboard. But before you can relax yourself, a customer walks right in.

But what kind of creature is the customer?
12131.title: The Lazy Okapi

122.content:
You awaken to a strange fluorescent light like that of an aurora and grunt. You then realize that you're standing up and you're barely clothed. You're wearing nothing but a pair of cargo shorts. "Huh?" you ask. "Where am I? What's going on? Oof!" As you're walking around in an attempt to get a better understanding of your surroundings, you give a grunt because you bump into some sort of invisible wall. You look and see that the invisible wall isn't so invisible, but it's a faint pink color that's almost too dull to see. You tap on it and it makes a sound of glass being tapped. You step on the floor and you see that the floor is glass as well. Upon further examination, you see that the pink glass wall was circular in shape and was all around you. If you didn't know better, you'd say you were in a bottle.

"What's going on?" you ask. "Where am I? Can anybody hear me?" You tap the walls again and then you look up to see something in the air that looked like it was a giant cork. You gasp and realize exactly where you are. "I'm in a bottle?" you ask. "Wait! How did I get in a bottle!? Who...?!" It was there a giant hand landed near your bottle. You have no idea whose hand it was but from what little wasn't shadowed out, you could see that whoever the hand belong to wasn't human. You then look up and see a pair of giant glowing eyes that shined like a pair of giant glowing moons. Then you turn your head and see an entire room of figures that were shadowed out from the poor lighting in the place and they had glowing eyes as well. They all came in several animalistic shapes and sizes.

You then see that what little light in the place was coming from a lamp of some sort and there was a broken light fixture on the ceiling, implying that there were electric problems at work. But before you can say anything about your situation, you see the owner of the hand by you bring down her other hand and use it to slam a giant gavel next to the bottle you're in and caused you to let out a loud scream before she spoke in a loud voice. "Next item up for bid, is a fine and rare specimen of a human. Yours to do with however you like. Bidding starts at 100 guilders." You give a gasp. From the sound of it, you were property in an auction of some kind, an auction for giants from the looks of it.

You see a woman of indeterminable species get up and yell out "125 guilders." You were now really worried, bidding had already started. "150 guilders." "200 guilders!" "250 guilders!" "275 guilders!" "300 guilders!" How did you end up in this mess. The bids echo through your ears like a sound of lightning and you have no idea who will end up buying you." The auctioneer rubs her chin and you see that she has a long snout of some kind before she snorts. "Come on, people," says the woman. "I have a rare specimen here." "400 guilders!" "500 guilders!" "1000 guilders."

The entire room stops and gasps as one woman rises, having spoken the bid in a deep contralto. The auctioneer herself is stunned before coughing. "We have 1000 guilders for this fine specimen. Going once, going twice. Sold." You begin to sweat. Somebody just bought you and the buyer waddled forward into the light and you see exactly who the buyer was as she pays the auctioneer and then holds up your bottle.

This woman was a 700-foot high anthropomorphic hippopotamus with bright black skin and long platinum blonde hair. She wore purple lipstick and a pair of circular glasses along with a blue suit of some sort. As she grinned at you, you see that she was very obese with a belly wider than she was tall and a rump that was even bigger. Her fingernails were painted purple and she smiled down on you as she took you away.
122.title: The Auction of Heavyweights

1221.content:
You look through the glass and see your new hippopotamus mistress and see all too well how much she outsizes you. She was absolutely enormous in both height and weight. She looks and smiles as she sees you in the bottle. The lights then come on and you see that the auctioneer was another hippopotamus much like your new mistress and she was just as ginormous. The auctioneer in contrast to your buyer had light purple skin, blue hair worn in a bobcat and cloud tattoos all over her body. The auctioneer smiled smugly at your new mistress.

"Well, well, well," says the auctioneer hippo. "Andrea. What a surprise. So you finally decided to go ahead and buy a human." Your darker-skinned hippopotamus mistress gives a chuckle. "Well," she says. "I'm not low on guilders at the moment, so I decided, what the heck and went for it. Besides, every lady hippo seems to be doing it." The auctioneer gives a smirk and shows off her large and intimidating teeth, scaring you half to death in the process as she lets out a yawn. "So, Andrea," says the auctioneer. "What are you going to do with him?" Andrea gives a scoff and tucks your bottle in her left breast pocket. "I believe that's my business. All I can tell you is that any human that works for me is expected to earn their keep around my house. See you later, Julie." With that, Andrea stomps away, her large and fat body shaking with every step.

As Andrea walks away, you look and see dozens of hippos just like her and Julie the auctioneer. You take a good long look and see several hippopotami and some of them even seem to be carrying humans as well. There was a bright orange-skinned hippopotamus woman who was dressed like a cowgirl with long brownish blonde hair. You see that she has two bottles for earrings, each containing a tiny human desperately trying to break loose. There was also a white-skinned hippopotamus with raven-colored hair and tattoos of roses all over her body. As she gets up, she lets out a yawn and you could swear you see a human applying whitener to her enormous fangs.

You give a blink as Andrea exits the building and the gargantuan hippopotamus is walking down the street. You see giant hippos of different colors and patterns. As Andrea is busy speaking on a cellphone, you see her passing by a yellow-skinned hippopotamus wearing black and white clothing with a pattern that made her resemble a taxi. She was carrying a human in her purse as she was busy texting. You then look at her cellphone and you see on the screen there is a strange planet that is covered in pink and yellow plants with a large blue ocean and a red ring around it. That told you something. You had ended up on a strange new planet where these giant hippos ruled the roost. You'd even say that you were in some kind of alternate dimension. How were you going to get back to your own world?

You struggle and grunt and shake in place to try and knock the bottle out of Andrea's pocket but Andrea feels what you're doing and stops you. “Don’t even try it, human,” she says with a smug grin on her face. “I happen to be much bigger and heavier than you.” That you couldn’t argue with. Even normal-sized hippos were dangerous. You just had to hope for the best and hope that your new mistress was a benevolent one. Up ahead, Andrea leads you to a fancy looking house with marble statues of different animals (all heavy land animals) surrounding it. She unlocks the door and you look in and see mahogany furniture and a very impressive looking interior. You let out a whistle as Andrea walks inside and then takes you out of your bottle before she sits down in an entire couch and smirks. “Alright, human,” she says. “Now to see if you were worth the price. What to do for your first chore.”

As the behemoth is pondering it over, you begin to sweat. What task does she finally decide to assign you to?
1221.title: In Hippo's Hands

choices: Too risky. Just power through it.
You can barely lift the brush...put it down and take a break.
12212.content:
A trilling beep suddenly sounds, startling you. Andrea produces a smartphone, and her eyes go wide at whatever is on the screen. "Dammit, I almost forgot! I got so caught up in the auction!" She shoved you in her breasts and took a laptop and phone headset from her purse. Within seconds, she had them set up and was jabbing on about bank accounts and huge numbers. She closed a call and plucked you from her boobs.

"Let's see if you can handle a little pedicure. Down you go." Your stomach lurches as Andrea suddenly lowers you to the floor in front of her bare hippo feet. They looked big enough to crush twenty people in one stomp. You scramble back, falling on your rear. Looking up, you see her rilfing through her purse, producing a bottle of candy-apple red nail polish. "Ever painted a lady's nails before, little human? No? Well hope you're a fast learner." She set the bottle down next to you. It was taller than you were She unscrewed the lid, dipped the brush in the polish and shoved it in your hands.

You suddenly felt relief Andrea was a hippo: flat pachyderm feet meant no toes to get stuck between or have to climb over. Too bad her nails were enormous, as big as stained glass windows on a cathedral.

Andrea stopped typing to jab a finger at you. "These are premium hardwood floors, and I don't want one drop of red on them. You get polish on anything but my nails, and your next chore will be seat cushion." She gave her couch-filling butt a slap, grinning. "Got it?"

You gulp. Andrea's ass would have been like a mountain falling on you. You doubted you'd even leave a body, just burst like a grape beneath her rump leaving nothing but a tiny red stain.
"...Couldn't you just put a towel down?"

Andrea chuckles. It's the laugh of a mother whose toddler just said something adorably stupid. She pushes her glasses down her snout, leaning towards you. "Sweetie, I'm the mistress; you're the human. You don't get to question your job, you just do it. Sure, I COULD put a towel down so no polish gets on the floor, but why not make it a bit more...challenging, for you? Hard work builds character, after all! Now chop-chop, get to painting. I'm meeting the girls tonight and want to look my best." And like you weren't even there, she went back to jabbering into her headset about rich hippos' money, fingers clacking at her keyboard.

You feel your face turn red. What a bitch! This hippo was making your job harder just because she could, just to make you fear failing even more than you already did! Being enslaved was bad enough, but you ended up with the most petty bitch possible. That sweet tone she insulted you with made it even worse.

No way would you just give up and let serving Andrea become your new life. You were gonna escape ASAP: anywhere but here. Even being a pet to a different hippo woman for the rest of your life would be more bearable than Andrea's condescending domination. Outsmarting this bitch couldn't be hard.

You heft the brush, barely getting your arms around the wide lid. It's not heavy, but just keeping your grip was already making your arms ache. You didn't think you could even hold the giant nail brush fo two minutes, let alone long enough to paint Andrea's nails. But, failure meant getting sat on. Better just bear it and hope for the best for now.

Taking VERY careful steps, you get within reach of Andrea's left foot--the closest one--and start on the largest nail, moving the brush at a snail's pace (bottom of nail to top, to stay as far from the floor as possible) to keep your grip and make sure nothing dripped onto the floor. The brush should have painted the entire nail in two or three strokes, but with you barely able to hold it, your first brush barely covered a small corner of the nail. The next brush barely increased the coverage, and got a splatter of red on Andrea's foot when you had to stretch your aching arms to reach the top.

You cringe, nearly dropping the brush. You waited a moment to see if she noticed the mistake

"Look into the Williams account, right now." Andrea was saying. You blink, stunned. Her voice had changed from her taunting earlier: it had steel now, intelligence. You forget your job and watch her above, flicking through financial records on her laptop. "Last few weeks, there's been a lot of shady transfers from some overseas hedge fund. Hundred grand even, once a day at five on the dot. Traced the fund, and they only do business with a bunch of computer shops, all owned by Williams...and the shops all opened in the last year. The fund doesn't even have a website, either. To me, that spells 'money laundering'. If it is, we need to report it BEFORE he gets busted for whatever he's doing or we'll be swimming in lawsuits. I sent you everything I found. Got it? Good, glad to help. Call me you find anything I missed." She closed the call and queued up another, rattling off what sounded like stock prices.

Okay...you did NOT see that coming.
Apparently Andrea was a financial powerhouse, and MUCH smarter than she let on. Maybe escaping her wouldn't be so easy.

Not good.

You shake off your worries and try to get back to painting her nails. In two more strokes, you finally paint half of her largest nail. Your arms feel like they're on fire, your hands are numb. You pant just trying to keep the brush from falling. Could you even do this? Paint ALL her nails?

Maybe if you put the brush down and took a break, you'd get some strength back...but what if that just upset Andrea?
12212.title: Painting Her Toenails

choices: She Plays with you in her Mouth
12213.content:
As Andrea thinks, she absentmindedly chews on tongue. She let out a grunt of annoyance as she felt the piece of lettuce that had been stuck in her teeth since lunch. After a few seconds of trying to work it out with her tongue, her eyes fell back on you and an idea popped into her head.

"Oh yes, you'll do just nicely for that."

You definitely didn't like the sound of that, or the mischievous look in her eyes.

"What do you want me to do, ma'am?" you asked nervously.

"Simple," she said as she began rummaging around inside her purse with her free hand. "I said that you would have to work to earn your place here, and that's exactly what you're going to do."

"But I don't even want to be here!" you whined. "I want to go home! I don't even know where here is or how I got here!"

Andrea giggled, making you scowl. Apparently she found your confusion and fear amusing.

"Now, now, let's have none of that, little human," she said. "Our race has been secretly abducting humans from your planet for the past few years now. Having a little human slave is all the rage now! I'm afraid you'll have to get used to the idea that you'll never see your home again. This is your home now, and I am your master."

You were angered at her complete nonchalance to your enslavement. This was your life, not some kind of game! Before you could tell her off, she let out a triumphant, "Ah-ha!" and pulled a roll of dental floss out of her purse. At first you weren't sure what she had planned, but after she snapped off a length of floss, a feeling of dread overcame you.

"Now," Andrea said. "I had quite a meal before that auction, and I got a bit of food stuck in my teeth as a result. I've been unable to get it for hours. So, what I need you to do is--"

"Forget it!" you burst out. "There's no way I'm going into your mouth to help you floss!"

Andrea laughed instead of getting mad. "Poor, little dear, you actually think you have a choice! Come now, dear, you're the size of an insect. If I want you in my mouth, there's not much you can do to stop me, is there?"

"B-but... you just bought me! What if I get hurt? What if you eat me?! You'll have wasted your money!"

"Oh pish-posh," Andrea said. "I have more self control than that! Now, once you get in there, it's the top teeth, in the back and to the right."

"B-b-but--"

"Enough stalling," she said, placing the strand of floss next to you on her palm. To you it was the size of a thick rope. "There's no getting out of going in my mouth, my dear. I won't let you out until all the food in my teeth is gone, so unless you want to stay in there for a long, long time, I advice you work hard to get done quickly."

There wasn't enough time to argue more, as Andrea lifted you before her mouth. Her smiling, purple lips parted, and her massive tongue rolled out in front of you like a super-sized red carpet being unfurled. Your hair was blown back as her warm breath wafted over you, carrying the scent of salad and ranch dressing. You knew arguing would be pointless. She was clearly past caring about your arguments, or your safety for that matter. You decided to just get this over with as quickly as possible. You coiled up the floss over your shoulder and took your first nervous steps onto her tongue. You fought an urge to hurl as your bare feet squished on her tongue. You weren't reassured when Andrea let out a sensual moan as she felt your skin on her tongue. Oh great, the thing that could eat you alive evidently loved your taste.

You tried to be both quick and careful as you walked across her tongue. The "floor" was slippery beneath your feet and you struggled to keep upright. Your efforts were futile though, as Andrea retracted her tongue back into her mouth, causing you to slip and fall. You face-planted on her tongue and Andrea let out another, "Mmmmmmmmmmm." You stood back up, gagging on her spit as you did so. You and your cargo pants were now drenched. You began walking back to where she said the troublesome food was stuck, the smell of her breath getting worse the closer you got. She may have kept her mouth open but it was still growing darker as you neared her throat. You could just make out the lettuce pieces near the very back.

Once you were standing directly under where you'd be working, the obvious problem finally crossed your mind. "Uh, how do I get up ther--?"

You were once again sent sprawling to the ground from another sudden movement of Andrea's tongue. This time, she was moving her tongue up like an elevator, taking you to the spot you'd be working. Unfortunately, she overshot her mark and you ended up slamming into the roof of her mouth.

"Oops," she said awkwardly, with her mouth full. "Orry."

Those two words were like cannons going off next your ears. You held your ears and grumbled as she positioned you in front of her teeth. Ready to get this whole thing over with, you forced the floss in between two gigantic teeth and began slowly working it up. It was hard work, and soon your arms were exhausted. The moisture of Andrea's mouth, and the constant work caused you to begin sweating. It felt like an hour before finally the damn lettuce leaf became unwedged. Unfortunately, it was the size and consistency of a wet blanket, and you didn't even have time to move as if felt on top of you. You struggled and pushed the partially digested food off you.

"I'm finished!" you said at last, wanting to finally get out of here.

"O'w t n," her voice boomed around you.

'Throw it in,' you translated to yourself. You cast a frightened look back at the edge of her throat. Since entering her mouth you'd done your best to avoid looking at it. As far as you were concerned, it was scary enough to be the entrance to hell itself. Damn hippo. You knew what she was doing. She knew you were scared, but she wanted to rub her dominance in over you. Still, you knew you wouldn't be freed until you'd done everything she asked. You walked slowly, dragging the lettuce on the ground behind you. When you finally got a few feet--from your point of view--from the entrance to the bottomless pit, you struggled to pick up the lettuce leaf, and, with a great heave, tossed it down the behemoth's throat. You watched in morbid fascination as it fell, soon vanishing into darkness. You heard her gulp and were terrified by how easily that could've been you, a mere morsel of food to be paid no second thought to. Being so near to something so deadly finally fired your fight or flight response and you decided you need to get out of here. Right now.

Carefully, you began backing away from the throat.

"Ok, I'm done now! You can let out!"

Suddenly, the light went out completely. Andrea had closed her mouth, leaving you in total darkness. Your heart pounded in fear as her giggles echoed around you.

"Oh no."

What happens now?
12213.title: Helping Her Floss

choices: She spits you out. (That was close!)
122131.content:
Andrea's tongue suddenly jolted beneath your feet, and you fall flat on your back into a puddle of hippo slobber. It's warm and slimy and disgusting; you try to wipe the stuff off your face but your already-soaked hands just spread it around even more.

"Mmmmmm...." There is was again, thunderous and booming. Andrea wasn't just dominating you, the titanic hippo was enjoying your taste! Fear kicks in and you try to scramble up, but her salivating maw is so slick you keep falling back down. You settle for getting up on your knees.

"Andrea! I said I'm done! This isn't funny, LET ME OUT!" You yell, trying to keep your voice from cracking.

That damn giggle echoes around her mouth again...and then her tongue rockets upward, knocking you down again as you're slammed into the roof of Andrea's mouth. The impact knocks the wind out of you and pancakes you between her tongue and the hard surface--you're submerged in saliva within the tight space and for a moment fear you'll drown. Andrea gulps down the saliva around you, moaning again. It must have picked up your apparently delicious flavor.

Her tounge seems to fall out from under you, and after a brief drop you're back on the fleshy surface. Then the world--or rather, Andrea's head--tilts, and you go tumbling across her mouth; nearly hitting your head on her teeth as you faceplant on the inside of her cheek. Her massive tongue slams into your back, knocking you senseless and drenching you in yet more hippo-spit. By now you're completely soaked. Andrea sighs in bliss as she pummels you--no, TASTES you--over and over again. After a few moments, her head tilts to the other side and the process repeats.

You lose track of time, but she keeps playing with you--you're caught in a tsunami of spit and swished around, pinned under her tongue, and even come close to getting chewed; over and over again. All the while, Andrea moans and giggles. You nearly drown in her salive more times than you can count.

Finally, dazed and soaked, you find yourself flat on your back once again; on the hippo woman's (thankfully still) tongue. A hot gust rushes over you as she gives one last, throaty sigh of bliss.

'Vhat...wash...amazhink..." Andrea slurs, trying to talk with her mouth full. "Welp, guesh I'm dom whif dat."

"Finally..." you mumble.

Andrea's tongue tenses up, and you cringe as you wonder what this pachydermic dominatrix will do next.....
122131.title: She Plays with you in her Mouth

1222.content:
It was a bright, sunny Summer day above the pacific ocean and you had decided to take the day to go sailing. You rented a sailboat and had gone out to see, looking at fish of all species swimming underneath the water under the light of the sun. “This is the life,” you say. “Out on the ocean, forgetting about the aches and pains of the big city. Makes me wish that I couldn’t go back. You then let out a sigh. “If only that were a possibility. I have work in the morning... really early.” That brief mention of your grueling job with obnoxious coworkers and an incompetent boss occuring in your head, for only a minute ruins your relaxing thoughts. But then you get over it and continue to sail out.

As you were sailing, you lose track of time and you look at your waterproof watch before you let out a gasp. “Oh my gosh!” you yell. “It’s almost two o’clock! I better get back to shore!” You turn around and start to sail back for the mainland... or at least you try to do so. The problem is that you sailed way too far out into the ocean and you had no clear idea where you were. You wander around aimlessly for an hour before you’re exhausted. “I really should’ve paid more attention to where I was sailing. I’m lost at sea.”

You were bemoaning your situation when you hear a squawking above like one of those annoying seagulls. Sure enough, you look up and see one of those annoying seagulls. Actually, you see a whole flock of those annoying seagulls. “Seagulls,” you mutter. “Just what I need.” That was when realization hit you. “Wait a minute,” you say to yourself. “Where there are birds, there’s land. If I follow those seagulls, I should be able to head back to the mainland.” You open the sail wide to let the wind take you and follow the seagulls and then you take out a paddle in order to avoid losing the trail. As you follow the seagulls, you see something in the distance.

What you see is an enormous blackish blue island with white and black spots all over it. You give a blink. “That’s a rather odd looking island. It doesn’t look like it’s anywhere near the mainland. “Oh well. Perhaps if I climb the top, I can look out and see where I am.” You anchor the boat near the bottom of the island and then you step foot on the island and grunt. As you feel the ground under your feet, to your surprise, the ground was hard and felt like leather. You tap your foot a few times in confusion and rub your chin and then you climb further up the island. Or at least, you try to climb. The leather-like feel makes it rather difficult for you to position yourself. “What kind of island is this? It feels like it isn’t an island at all.”

It was at that moment the island begun to shake and you gasp. You try to grab the ground but its too thick and you have to grab the edge of the island. “What?” you ask. “Islands don’t have edges. Whoa!” The island then starts moving, violently shaking the water and destroying the boat that you rented in the process. “No!” you yell. “Crap! There goes my damage deposit!” Of course, you have much bigger problems (literally bigger) as the island rises up and reveals that it isn’t an island at all. What you were on, was the shell of a giant, big-bellied, thick-skinned anthropomorphic leatherback sea turtle woman who from the looks of it, had a large Cleopatra-style nose, bright red lips and medium length reddish purple hair. The turtle woman feels you and then plucks you off her neck with her thick fingers as you yell.

The turtle giantess brings you up in front of her face and smirks. “Aren’t you a cute little human,” she says. “I think I’ll keep you.” You can only blink as you look at the giant woman with a mix of surprise and fear.
1222.title: Turtle Island

12221.content:
"K-K-Keep me?" you ask this giant sea turtle lady. "Wh-Wh-What do you mean by that." The turtle lets out a laugh and you swear that her stomach would shake like gelatin if it weren't for her large shell. "Mmm," thinks the turtle giantess as she rubs her rather large chin. "Mmm. I really don't know. Maybe I'll keep you as a pet or maybe I'll keep you as a servant. I really don't know for sure myself. I've never actually had a human before. But I have always wanted one. I'll decide what to do once I take you to my grotto." You look back and see nothing but ocean for miles. "Grotto?" you ask. "You mean as in a cave? As in under the sea?" The sea turtle licks her own cheek and then nods her head.

You were worried and confused as to how the turtle thought she was supposed to pull something like a trip back to her grotto off. "Wait a minute," you say. "I can't breathe underwater." "Us sea turtles can't either. We're just really good at holding our breath." "But how are...?" The sea turtle woman laughs uncontrollably and even gives a snort. "Oh," she says as she pets you like a pet. "Don't worry about that, my little human. I know a perfect place to keep you for the ride all the way back to my underwater grotto." The sea turtle then opened her mouth wide and showed flat teeth you didn't expect a turtle to have. She held out her tongue like a large and fleshy red carpet and you look in more fear than ever. The turtle obviously expected you to ride in her mouth.

You shiver and look into the turtle woman's eyes and she nods her head a few times before she points to the inside. This reminded you of a video game you played long ago that also involved a giant turtle's mouth. While reluctant to do so, you walk into the mouth just as the turtle shuts it and dives. You hold on tight to the turtle's tongue and hope you don't get swallowed. You stay in for 2 hours and your captor still is swimming through the ocean. You're beginning to wonder if there really is an undersea grotto or she's just planning to eat you.

But do you both manage to get to the grotto?
12221.title: To the Turtle's Grotto

1223.content:
You woke up to see the impossible. Last night you had fallen asleep in a comfy bed, but when you woke up now, you were lying on the floor of a plastic, hamster cage. Instead of the pajamas you'd worn to bed, you were dressed in some kind of white jumpsuit. On realizing your situation, a flood of questions entered your mind: Have I been kidnapped? How? Why? What happened last night? Where were you? What the hell was going on?! You approached the clear wall of your prison to get a better look outside. What you saw made your jaw drop, and one question, more important than all the others, sounded off in your head and escaped your mouth, "Have I been shrunk?!"

Outside your cage you could see you were on a giant desk at the forefront of a classroom. From your point of view, the desk was as long as an airplane runway. A shiny, red apple next to the cage was easily three times as big as you were. But as large as a simple piece of fruit was, it was nothing compared to the gargantuan beings sitting in the desks facing you. None of them were human. In fact they all resembled different kinds of animals. In the front row sat a purple-colored rabbit wearing a turtle-neck sweater and round glasses. She had a notebook in front of her and was already writing. On either side of her was a muscled lioness dressed in a pink tracksuit, lazing about in her chair, and an obese elephant dressed as some kind of punk rocker who was nodding her head to the music blaring out of her headphones. There were at least half a dozen other giants seated behind them. There were only two things each of these colossal creatures present had in common. The first was that they all looked like they were college grads. The second was that they were all women.

The sight of them made your head spin, and you turned around, hoping that putting them out of your mind would make you feel better. Instead, a gigantic chalkboard filled your vision, and the words written on it caused you to fall to your knees: "HUMAN OBEDIENCE 101!"

A bell rang signaling the start of class just as the door to the classroom opened and a new figure walked inside, carrying a cardboard box under her arm. Like the others she was a giant animal who walked on two legs. She was a dog with white and silver fur. Her black hair was worn in a prim bun, and she wore rectangular glasses. She was dressed in a pink, low-cut blouse that revealed an impressive amount of cleavage, and a black skirt that barely covered her colossal ass. She was also monstrously obese. Her blue eyes fell on you as she entered. It was only for a moment but it frightened you almost more than waking up the size of an insect among giants had. There had been no warmth in her eyes at all.

"Good evening, class," the dog said in a clipped, frosty voice. She put her box down on the desk next to your cage and turned to face the class, all of whom were watching her attentively. "I am Ms. Lovelace, and I will be your teacher for the summer. Being here means that each of you are planning on purchasing a human, but before you do, you wish to be educated on the best ways to own them. Now I realize human ownership is the big craze nowadays, but I'm here to warn you that it's not easy. Humans are incredibly expensive and very hard to care for. It's true that when we take them from earth we do subject them to procedures that increase their endurance, but that doesn't mean they're indestructible. If you're going to play with them or punish them, you need to know what counts as too much. Otherwise they break and you've just flushed the thousands needed to buy one straight down the toilet."

"Break?!" you squeaked in terror. Unfortunately, they either couldn't hear you or couldn't care, since all of the ladies eyes were still on Ms. Lovelace.

"Ms. Lovelace?" the bunny girl asked, raising her hand. "Isn't it true that there have been cases where some humans do become indestructible from our procedures?"

Ms. Lovelace sighed. "Yes," she said in annoyance. "There have been three cases where side effects from the procedures we subject them to, render the human indestructible. However, these are fluke cases that we've been unable to create on purpose. And there's no known way to find out if a human is impervious to damage short of intentionally trying to kill them and seeing if they survive. Since I doubt any of you girls want to make such a huge gamble with your money, we'll operate under the assumption that you haven't hit the proverbial jackpot with your human."

The bunny girl blushed in embarrassment and buried her face back in her notebook.

"Now," Ms. Lovelace continued. "During the next few months, I will instruct you on the proper ways to care for your human, how to train them to follow your commands, how to punish them if they misbehave without killing them, how to condition them to be the perfect slave to you in every way. You'll learn things like how much pressure they can withstand, how long they can go without air, how long they can survive in stomach acids before being digested, and all the rest of the standard disciplinary techniques anthro owners use."

Those were the standard techniques?! You felt like you were going to be sick.

"Take this human, here," she said, acknowledging your presence for the first time. All the rest of the ladies in class now looked at you, and you could see for the first time that there was a kind of hunger in some of their eyes. "This one we've just got off planet last night. He'll be especially hard to control since he hasn't had time to adjust to his new role in life. Luckily I'm a trained professional, and I know all the best ways on how to shape your human slaves to your will. He'll assist me in showing you the master-servant dynamics of our relationships. You all won't start out with humans of your own. Until you learn enough to practice with my small helper here, you'll be using these life-size human dolls to try out for yourselves." As she said this, she reached into the cardboard box and pulled out a flesh-colored doll that resembled a fully-grown human.

"Now, before we begin with these, I'll give you a brief lesson on basic human care."

You were barely listening as Ms. Lovelace began droning on about how often humans needed to eat and sleep. Instead you were trying to formulate a plan to break out of here and get back home. Unfortunately for you, there was absolutely no way out of your cage. The only opening was through the ceiling, and there was nothing in the cage to climb on to, to reach the top. And all the walls were flat. After twenty minutes of futilely trying to think of an escape plan, your fears finally wore you down and you just began trying to climb the clear walls.

The punk elephant saw your efforts and laughed. Ms. Lovelace broke off her lecture and turned to see what was so funny. You froze when her eyes fell on you again.

Ms. Lovelace tut-ted in annoyance. "I'm used to students disrupting my lectures, but most humans are usually too smart to try something like that. I see you're an exception to the rule," she said, triggering a chorus of laughs from her students. She didn't acknowledge them, only keeping her frosty glare on you. "If you're so keen on making a scene in this class, I'd be more than happy to bring you front and center to everyone's attention. Let's get started with a demonstration on proper obedience training."

Ms. Lovelace opened the cage and reached inside. You tried to scurry from her hand, but it was no good. She plucked you out of your jail easily and raised you to her face. You begged her to have mercy on you, but her face remained stoic as she pondered what kind of punishment she should inflict on you first.
1223.title: Lessons in Misery

12231.content:
"Alright class," Ms. Lovelace said. "Before I demonstrate a proper disciplinary technique, why don't we give our class pet a name?"

"I already have a name!" you squeaked out. "It's--"

"Runt!" the punk rocker elephant called out.

She was hands down the fattest girl in the room. She had tanned brown skin and black hair with violet streaks. She wore black lipstick and violet eye shadow. Her black t-shirt was form-fitting and had a human skull on it. Her thick legs were covered in fishnet stockings reaching up to her dark blue, plaid skirt. The end of her trunk was pierced with a silver stud.

The class laughed at her suggestion.

"All in favor?" the teacher asked.

All hands went up.

"Very well, Runt it is. Thank you for your suggestion, Greta."

The elephant girl blew you a mocking kiss and you glared at her. The sight of you trying to look intimidating must've been a special kind of pathetic because the class tittered at your display. Ms. Lovelace cleared her throat and the class went silent. Clearly they were much more scared of her than they were of you.

"My personal preference for disciplining humans is just a simple sit," she said. "It's painful, humiliating, and a quick way of reminding them how insignificant they are with minimal effort on your part."

While she spoke of this so matter-of-factly, you squirmed wildly in her hand, freaking out about what was about to happen. Ms. Lovelace ignored your efforts and wheeled out a stool wide enough to accommodate her monstrous ass to the front of the class. She pinned you on the seat with one finger and secured you to the leather with a strand of scotch tape. No matter how much you fought, the tape made sure you weren't going anywhere. Ms. Lovelace circled around you so that her backside was displayed to the class. To your panicked eyes, it looked like a moon ready to crash into the planet.

"Watch carefully now, because you're going to be performing this on the human test dolls I give you. If you do something that would result in the death of your human, they make a sound letting you know they're dead. Luckily they're easily replaceable, unlike our Runt."

The teacher grabbed hold of a planetary cheek in each hand through the fabric of her skirt and spread them apart. She positioned herself so that your body would fit snuggly in the crack between them. You begged for mercy as the giant dog woman gently lowered herself on you. These cries became muffled as a mountain of flab spread over you and enveloped your entire body. Despite how gently Ms. Lovelace was seating herself, her butt seemed to want nothing more than to turn you into a pancake.

Ms. Lovelace was right. It was painful. It was humiliating. And you've never felt so insignificant in your life as this dog woman casually smooshed you beneath her butt. You knew the only reasons you were still alive was because whatever procedures they had subjected you to had increased your toughness, and because the teacher was holding back. It would take minimal effort for her to kill you right now. The pressure was unbearable that you couldn't so much as move a finger. Somehow you could still hear her lecturing the class as she used you as her personal cushion.

"The trick is to not put all your weight on them. One cheek is enough to turn your human into a red stain. I advise you get them between your cheeks so your weight is evenly distributed and not all directly on your pet. Also, remember to let your human breathe. After our procedures, they don't need as much oxygen, so you can keep them underneath you for as much as five minutes. Now please pay close attention as I display the proper ways to bounce and twist..."

You tried to protest but your mouth was full of skirt-wrapped cellulite. Slowly, Ms. Lovelace began to bounce up and down, mashing you between her cheeks. Your whole body cried out in pain as the teacher put you through every butt-related punishment in chapter 1 of her class's text books. You were squashed and stretched like an accordion. Her cheeks chewed you up like a piece of gum. Every five minutes or so she'd stand up so you could gasp for air and let out some pathetic cries for help, before you once again disappeared underneath her ass as the class took notes. You were in so much pain and all the while you wondered what you'd ever done to deserve this as your body was ravaged by her ass.

Twenty minutes later, Ms. Lovelace got up and didn't sit back down. The class laughed at the sight of your mangled form. You were in too much pain to even give them the finger in defiance. Ms. Lovelace appraised you with the same cold, analytical expression from before.

"And as you can see, our human is still alive and well."

"Well?!" you screamed in your head since you couldn't out loud.

"I'll pass around the human dolls now. You girls take ten minutes to practice what I showed you on them."

You were almost grateful for the ten minute reprieve. At least, you would be, if the she-beast wasn't the one who'd caused you such pain to begin with. She may have claimed to be a professional, but another minute or so and you'd have no doubt you'd end up--

POP! You heard a loud sound like a balloon popping. A pig girl had ended up breaking her human doll. She apologized profusely as Ms. Lovelace gave her another doll. You heard more pops as doll after doll broke beneath their owner's weight. By the time the ten minutes had passed only three students dolls were still intact. They belonged to the purple pear-shaped rabbit who'd asked about invincible humans at the beginning of class, the muscular lioness, and that behemoth, Greta, who'd given you the undignified name, "Runt."

Ms. Lovelace congratulated each of them on keeping their dolls "alive." Then she...

1) Called the three girls up to demonstrate their sitting techniques on you.

2) Moves on to another disciplinary practice.
12231.title: Sit

122311.content:
The trio approached the front of the class, the rabbit girl looking more self-conscious than Greta and the lioness who seemed glowing with excitement. Even though the tape had come loose from the teacher's exercises, you were in no condition to crawl away.

"Now, who would like to go first?" Ms. Lovelace asked.

"Ooh! Me! Me!" the lioness said and stepped forward before her classmates could object. She was in much better shape than Greta or the rabbit girl, but that didn't mean she looked lighter. She was completely ripped, her arms and legs bulging with muscles. Her fur was orange and her hair was gold. She wore a pink tracksuit, a white tube top underneath and gray yoga pants.

"Very well, Diana, you may go first."

The lioness gave a hoot of joy and approached. "Like what you see, little guy? I worked very hard to get my ass in this shape."

"Please don't do this!"

"Of course I'll give you a closer look," Diana said, pretending you were saying something else. "No need to beg!"

The rest of the class laughed as she lowered her ass down on top of you. Her ass was so toned, it was like she was like being crushed beneath too boulders. You had no idea how she didn't pop her human doll because it felt like you would burst at any moment. The only bright side was that Ms. Lovelace seemed to notice that you weren't holding out so well. After only a minute she asked Diana to stand. You nearly shed tears of joy when Diana got off you.

"Thank you, Diana, please take your seat. Not on him," she said, annoyed when Diana tried to sit back down on you.

"Fine," she pouted and went back to her desk.

"Now, which of you would like to go next?"

"Step aside, Kelly," Greta said, pushing the shy rabbit to the side before she could volunteer. "Let a real woman show you how it's done."

You immediately reconsidered your fear of the lioness. Not only was the elephant at least three times her weight, but for some reason she had it out for you. You pitied whichever poor human found himself in her clutches once she graduated this class. Greta approached you with an exaggerated swing in her step. She displayed her massive backside to the class proudly. She looked over her shoulder, met your eye, and ran one hand up a meaty thigh, ending it by giving one ass cheek a meaty smack.

You didn't try begging again. You knew it wouldn't get you anywhere. That didn't make the fear any smaller when the behemoth backside began lowering down on top of your tiny form. As the flab washed over you, you experienced pain and pressure worse than you had under Ms. Lovelace. Greta was either a fast learner or she'd already been practicing before ever setting foot in class. She did all the same exercises that Ms. Lovelace had shown off for the class. She "chewed" you between her ass cheeks, bounced up and down on you, and ground her ass down into the leather upholstery. Ms. Lovelace was so impressed that she didn't ask her to stand until Greta had finished the entire routine.

"Very impressive, Greta," Ms. Lovelace said. "I believe you'll be getting extra credit for this."

"Guess there's a first time for everything," Greta laughed. "I'd be more than happy to show off some of my own moves to the class."

"Oh God, please don't!" you thought frantically, still underneath her.

"No, that won't be necessary. Please stand so Kelly can take her turn."

Greta groaned but got up begrudgingly. "Let's do this again some time," she said before going back to her desk.

"Alright Kelly, it's your turn now."

Kelly approached you far more nervously than the other two had. She seemed much more terrified of you than you were of her, and considering this was the most terrifying day of your life all around, that was saying something. When she met your eyes she blushed and immediately looked away.

"Um... Ms. Lovelace... I-I'm n-not sure I should..."

"Come now, dear, there's nothing to worry about. He's not going to bite you."

"And if he does, trust me, it feels great!" Greta said, drawing more laughs from the class.

Ms. Lovelace silenced Greta with a look then made a motion to Kelly to continue. Kelly stood over you but looked too scared to sit. She tried lowering herself on top of you, each time scaring you as your ravaged form prepared to experience even more pain, but before she could seat herself she would chicken out and stand upright.

"Please do this today, Kelly," Ms. Lovelace said impatiently.

The rabbit forced a determined look on her face. Finally she seemed ready to try. You just wished this whole thing could be over with. Kelly began to lower herself almost tortuously slowly. When she was mere centimeters from coming into contact with you, Greta blew a loud raspberry in her hands.

However Greta thought Kelly would react, the rabbit handled it differently. Instead of slipping, she was so scared by the sudden noise that she literally jumped into the air. Her powerful rabbit legs sent her almost to the ceiling, before she came plummeting down, ass-first, aimed directly at where you were stuck.

Her ass smashed into you with the force of a meteor, flattening you like a pancake. The entire class stared at her aghast at the likely death of the class pet. Even the aloof Ms. Lovelace and Greta herself looked horrified of what'd just happened. Kelly blushed furiously, her entire face turning pink and her ears drooping in shame. She felt your form underneath her and she never felt more mortified in her entire life.

"Sorry," she mumbled to the class.

Did you survive?
122311.title: Class Participation

1223111.content:
Your first thought was surprise at finding yourself still alive. Well, technically it was your third thought. Your first was "OOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOWWWWWWWWWWWWWW!" while your second was "GET THE FUCK OFF ME!"

Kelly got off and you took great pained breaths. She turned around and looked surprised to see that you hadn't become a red stain on the chair. Ms. Lovelace approached, clearly expecting the worst, only to look equally surprised when she saw you still alive on the chair.

"Um, Ms. Lovelace," Kelly said nervously. "Can humans usually survive something that?"

"No, Kelly. Most humans would've been reduced to paste after a squashing like that."

By now the rest of the class was standing up in their seats, trying to get a good look at you. At first they'd been shocked at your possible demise, but since learning you survived, you detected a distinctly hungry look in most of their eyes. Maybe it would've been better for you if you had died.

The teacher peeled you off the seat between two fingers and raised you to her eye. She inspected you with a cold, analytical gaze. It felt like she was disassembling you with her eyes, trying to guess as to your physical makeup that could account for your survival. Whatever "gentleness" she treated you with before was gone now. She squeezed her fingers twice and seemed unsurprised when your ribcage didn't break.

"Ms. Lovelace," Greta said. She stepped forward eagerly, looking at you with an almost predatory gleam in her eye. "Does this mean that Runt is invinc--"

She was interrupted by a bell ringing, signaling the end of class. Ms. Lovelace chose not to answer her student's question.

"That will be all for today," she said. "Read chapters 2 and 3 for class tomorrow." None of the students moved. They looked like they'd just found a new toy only to be told they couldn't play with it. "Class dismissed."

Ms. Lovelace said it so sharply no one dared argue with her. One by one the students filed reluctantly out of the class, talking in whispered conversations. Greta and Kelly were the last to leave. You could overhear the elephant girl tell the blushing rabbit, "See Kel, you shouldn't feel embarrassed. Thanks to your big butt we've just found out our class has the best toy ever."

Once everyone was gone, Ms. Lovelace locked the door and pulled down a blind over the window so no one in the hall could see inside. When that was done she took a seat at her desk. She still gripped you in her fingers, staring at you with those cold eyes.

"Statistically, it's so unlikely for a human to become invulnerable from our experiments that it borders on impossible. Yet somehow you survived the equivalent of a mountain falling on you from orbit. It seems, perhaps, you may be invincible after all... Of course, that all could've been a fluke. Most humans would die from that, but it's possible you're just incredibly lucky."

After what you'd been through, you'd laugh in her face at being called lucky, but everything hurt too much for you to make even that display of defiance. Besides, there was something in the teacher's eyes that you dreaded seeing.

"An indestructible human would come in very handy," Ms. Lovelace admitted, "but I'd need to test you further to be sure."

"For the love of God," you croaked in panic. "What do you want from me? What else could you possibly do that would make you more sure I'm invincible than you are right now?"

For the first time, Ms. Lovelace smiled and the sight was cold and terrible.

"Funny you should ask," she said. "There is one surefire thing I could do to you that would give me all the proof I need."

What does she do?
1223111.title: Maybe-Super Mini-Man

12231112.content:
An ominous growl came from the teacher's stomach, making you grow pale. You hoped it wasn't a sign of things to come, but when Ms. Lovelace met your eyes again, she licked her lips.

"You can't be serious!" you protested.

"It is the one thing no non-indestructible human has ever survived. At least, none of the humans I've eaten have ever lived through it."

"You've actually eaten people before? That's disgusting!"

Ms. Lovelace shrugged. "What can I say? It's not unheard of around these parts. Lots of girls enjoy snacking on tiny humans as a guilty pleasure. Unfortunately you're kind is too expensive for us working class folk to do it regularly. If we don't get you out before you digest than we just end up flushing away a big investment."

"But what if I'm not invincible?"

"Then I'll make up some excuse to explain your absence. I'll tell the class you ended up dying from Kelly after all and needed to be disposed of. We're insured for up to three replacement humans. I doubt your death wouldn't disrupt the curriculum too much."

This puppy must've had solid ice running through her veins. You couldn't believe how casually she was talking about your possible death. She didn't even give you a chance to reply before suspending you above her head. From this angle, the light reflecting off her glasses completely blocked out her eyes, adding to her frosty face and making her look even more sinister.
