Pearl stops her gushing, and you tense up. How would Dracana react to your last-minute victory?
131212121221.title: Dragon Slayer

1313.content:
"... A present for my wife's birthday." You give a blink. "What was that?" you ask. Pearl gives a smile. "You should consider it an honor. The very reason that I decided to take a human servant is to be a pet for my wife, Diamond." You give a gulp. It was one thing for this enormous whale as big as several mountains took you as a sacrifice but you weren't even for her. You were a present for her wife.

You give a cough. "Wait, wife?" Pearl gave a snort. "Is that a problem? Life can come in all shapes and sizes. It is as natural as the love among you mortals. You see, my wife is fascinated by humans and has never seen one up close before. She considers them to be the most adorable creatures in existence. Several of her friends have boasted about their humans and she's been depressed at the fact that she doesn't have one of her own." Pearl gives a giggle.

Pearl was talking as if she was merely buying a pet for her wife as a birthday present, but instead, she had to intimidate a community in order to get you. You don't know how this Diamond treats humans. Wait, didn't Pearl say she had never seen a human before. Oh no. What if she didn't know how to treat humans properly and crushed you. Then you realize something; you had absolutely no idea what Diamond was. You heard that these titans didn't always settle down with creatures of their own race. You even heard of a titan couple consisting of a male fox and female rabbit.

Of course, you do not want to find out what you're getting yourself into and try to jump out of Pearl's hand but Pearl catches you in her other hand. "I thought I made it clear that I didn't want you to so much as think about escaping. I'll forgive you since I need you for Diamond's birthday present. But if you misbehave before I have a chance to give you to my wife, I'll have no choice but to swallow you and demand another sacrifice. Your face turns pale white at the thought of literally being swallowed by a whale and you nod your head. "I'll be good. I'll be good."

"Who are you talking to, Pearl?" asks a voice. It was there another giantess stomped in, a blast of cold air in her wake. She appeared to a titanic obese light brown-skinned anthropomorphic manatee with her hair worn in a beehive. She wore a one piece blue bikini with stars printed on it and a golden tiara. Pearl smiled and then turned around. "Happy birthday, Diamond."

Diamond looks down at you and squees, her eyes going wide with glee. "Oh, Pearl, he's sooooo cute! Thank you!" The manatee picks you up and gives you a big kiss that's cold to the touch, her frigid lips covering you from head to toe and painting you red with her lipstick. Was she a goddess of winter?

You give a nervous smile as Diamond keeps grinning down at you. "Well," you say. "She seems friendly enough."
1313.title: A Present For Pearl's Wife

132.content:
Jupiter is the biggest planet in the known solar system and also holds the record as the planet with the most moons at a whopping record of 63 confirmed moons. However, scientists believe that there are still some moons that have yet to be discovered. This might very well be the case, because a new moon was recently discovered orbiting around Jupiter but this moon was unusual looking in that it looked like it actually had plants and life on it. That was where you come in. You were an astronaut dispatched to look into this new and currently unnamed moon. As you sit in the cockpit of your rocket, you see the moon up ahead surrounded by several clouds that almost looked like smoky quartz. “Give me a break,” you say. “There is absolutely no way there’s life on this moon. Heck, it’s a moon for crying out loud. Moons can’t support life. Those big wigs must’ve just seen the clouds and thought they were trees.

But as you get closer and closer to the 64th moon, you see strange trees with multi-colored striped trunks and star shaped leaves as well as pink and yellow covered dirt that almost looked like those on Earth. “What!?” you yell. You land your spaceship on the ground and you see that the trees are thousands of feet tall and in the distance there even seems to be a lake. You’re dumbfounded and absentmindedly take off your helmet as you look out. “No way,” you say. “This can’t be a moon. More than likely it’s an unknown dwarf planet. Leave it to a witless bureaucracy to deem anything smaller than a planet a moon.” It was there that you realized that you took your helmet off and then you gag.

“Oh no!” you yell. “Oh no!” After coughing a few times however, to your surprise, you don’t feel any different and you simply blink. “The air’s not toxic?” you ask. “I can’t believe it. You inhale and exhale a few times before you go on your merry way through the planet. It looks like some sort of jungle, yet you see no forms of life. “Maybe this is one of those planets that only have plants.” Suddenly you hear a yelling sound and a crashing sound. You hear several curses and then run back and see that your spaceship has been heavily damaged and you gasp. “Oh my gosh!” Upon further inspection, you see that the spaceship was left in an enormous crater that almost looked like the footprint of a large feline. You give a gulp. “On second thought...”

Before you complete your sentence, you hear a stomping sound and you feel someone or something staring down at you. You then look up to see that looking down on you was a bright reddish brass-furred anthropomorphic lioness with bright blonde hair with red highlights in it and glowing golden eyes. The lion giantess was exactly 800ft tall and was rather obese looking, especially in her belly and rump. She was also wearing a bright greenish bronze spandex leotard along with a crown of some kind and earrings shaped like alien skulls. There was a large sword in her belt and she was holding her foot in pain. You stare in fear as the lioness growls and glares down at you.

“So,” says the lioness in a surprisingly light-sounding voice. “You are the invader that my people told me about.”

You panic and shake your hands. “Wait, wait, Ms. Lion, please! I’m not an invader! I was just sent to investigate this moon.”

The lioness roars angrily. “How dare you call our planet a moon! I’ll have you know that this is a planet ruled over by amazon lionesses, and I happen to be their queen. We’ve been watching your planet from a distance and we don’t like what we see. Clearly your species are psychotic apes that were looking for a new planet to wreak havoc on. You were an advanced scout and the injuries your vessel did to my foot prove you don’t come in peace.”

"Hey!” you yell. “You can’t blame me just because you were clumsy enough to step on my ship!” You cover your mouth and then you feel a stronger glare.

The queen lioness plucks you up and squeezes you as you gag. “In case you didn’t know,” she says. “On this planet, we females rule the roost. Perhaps once the invaders see their advanced scout reduced to a mere servant of the queen of this planet, they’ll think twice about invading.” Your captor smirks and you begin to sweat heavily. This was not the best situation you were ever in and it looked like there was no way out.
132.title: Amazon Lions on the Moon

choices: Lina drops you in the seat and sits on you
She shoves you between her breasts
1321.content:
The skyscraper-sized lioness gave an arrogant chuckle. “Trembling already? Hmph; for all you humans’ hubris and ignorance, I never pegged you for cowards. You target our world for invasion, but can’t even keep your dignity when captured? How amusing.” She moves you closer to her mouth, each word giving you a blast of her fruit-scented breath. “For your sake, I hope you’re a better servant than you are a warrior. We Felines are more civilized than you humans could ever hope to be, but we haven’t left our predatory ways completely behind…”

She opens her maw to reveal a mouthful of glistening white fangs as big as your whole body. A feline tongue, big as a tank and rough like sandpaper, snakes out to give your face an abrasive lick.
“Hmm...a bit bland.”

Your response is to scream like a little girl and cringe away, fear shoving aside any thoughts of dignity. “Please don’t eat me!!”

Laughing at your terror, the fat feline monarch stomps through the forest with your tiny form clenched in her fist.

===

I’m gonna be sick… was your only thought not long into the lion queen’s walk. Between her arms swinging with each step and your vision tumbling and swaying like a ship in a storm, you’d been left dizzy and rattled; on the verge of motion-sickness. Low-hanging plants smacking you in the face all the way didn't help either, the lioness walking near them on purpose.

The only thing keeping you from vomiting on the giant lioness’ hand was the fear of what sort of terrible things do to you for getting her hand dirty. All you could do was look at the ground below, trying to get your bearings.

“Good Morning, Lina!” a new voice rings out, startling you. The queen, now named Lina, even stops walking. “How do you find the Royal Gardens, Big Sister?”

You look up to see Lina smiling at the newcomer. “They were as beautiful as always, Alicia...though I also captured a scout for an upcoming invasion.” Lina brings her hand up, giving you a fresh bout of nausea, and opens her palm to reveal you.

You look up to see another giant lioness, gazing down at you curiously. Alicia was covered in pitch black fur with silvery hair and green eyes, wearing what could only be called a metal white bikini top and belt with a red loincloth at her waist; a small pistol holstered at her hip. She was shorter than her queen, and a bit less fat. Still pudgy, but not nearly as bulbous as Lina.

"An invader...hmm, it seems you were right about the humans, my Queen. Are you planning on eating this one? And shall I summon the generals to prepare for war?” You cringe at that, making both lioness sisters giggle.

“No, not yet at least. I plan on making him my own personal servant as punishment for his part in the invasion.” Lina smirks evilly at you. “And with their scout captured, we can use him as an example to get the humans to back down. We are the more noble race, we must show that we are merciful and do not go to war on a whim....well, to a point. As for eating him, that’s only if he disobeys his new Mistress.” She looms over you and slaps her belly with her free hand, making it jiggle. “Or if I feel like it. Whatever comes first.”

Alicia smiles, throwing an arm around Lina. The two sisters were obviously close. “Well, let’s get back to the palace so you can enjoy your new little servant. I’ve already sent for the rocket-car to pick you up.”

You blink. Wait….rocket car?

====

Outside the forest, now revealed to be Queen Lina’s private retreat, the rocket-car awaited. The thing looked like an old 50s hot-rod mixed with a flying saucer, complete with big domes over the cockpit and passenger seats, and fins on the tail. The handful of guards surrounding the thing--all giant felines, mostly lions with a few leopards and panthers--wore grey spandex bodysuits with what looked like SWAT armor on their chests, elbows and knees. They carried rounded, stubby rifles that looked like scaled-up versions of cheap toy “laser guns”, and had small swords sheathed at their waists. There were a few male cats among them, but the officers, identified by their shoulder pads and long, sparkling capes, were all female.

They all looked like something right out of a bad movie, or vintage comic book. Buck Rogers or Flash Gordon would be right at home here.

A leopardess guard saluted as Lina and Alicia approached. ”Hail the Queen! Glory to her mane!” Her comrades echoed her, one of them popping open a rear dome on the rocket car for his queen and her sister to enter, another climbing into the cockpit.

Lina entered first, glancing at you as she began to sit down. “I’m getting tired of holding you, human. Something else for the ride back to my palace..."
1321.title: Where's Buck Rogers When You Need Him?

choices: Lina goes to her chambers alone to toy with you.
Lina and Alicia order a meal...and order YOU to feed them!
Lina prepares to send a warning to Earth...using YOU as an example!
13211.content:
Lina’s yellow eyes light up, some devious idea coming to her. Without warning she lets go of you, dropping you screaming onto the rocket car’s plush seat. You bounce once and get the wind knocked out of you—at your size, it was at least a ten-foot drop.

Then a shadow covers you, and you look up to see Lina’s massive feline rear looming over you as she climbs into the vehicle. You try to cry out, but your pleas go unanswered as the giant Space Amazon Lioness casually lands her plump ass on you, squishing you into the seat. You groan in pain as she twists and grinds her cheeks on your tiny form for good measure, laughing like a cartoon villain. “Even my behind is stronger than you! Do you see the folly of your invasion now, human?”

From under Lina's all-encompassing booty, you hear Alicia giggle as she enters the rocket-car, sitting next to her sister. “Sitting on him? That seems a bit…childish, sister. Perverse, even!” she teases, seeming to enjoy your plight as much as Lina was.

Lina wiggles her rear again. “Well, since a servant’s status is beneath that of a Queen, I thought it would be quite poetic if he learned his place in a…literal sense,” she quipped. “Besides, didn't YOU enjoy doing this to shrunken assassins back when Mother held the throne?”

“That was before one of them splattered all over my favorite dress! It took a week to get the blood out—Big Sister, I STILL don't know how you can do that without turning them to paste…”

The dull whine of the rocket-car’s engine powering up sounded. Beneath you, the vehicle began to shake as it readied for takeoff…which pressed you further against Lina’s rear.

Lina moaned in bliss at your plight before chuckling teasingly at her sister. “You should have paid more attention to my lessons, Little Sister!”


You didn't know how far the ride in the rocket-car took you. You were battered, short on breath and in pain from your time under Lina's rump. You didn't even resist when she peeled you off her cheeks like a sticker as she got up, carrying you once again in her fist through her sprawling palace, Alicia and a few guards following her.

But where do they go now?
13211.title: (Lion) Queen-Sized Rump

1322.content:
The sun was going down. You could see it from the stained glass window of your mistress’s citadel as you stand on the dining room table. You are beyond afraid and you hastily slide down the table leg and then run into the hallway. “I can’t be late!” you yell to yourself. “It’s almost night time. Janine specifically told me to wake her up as soon as the night falls. You rush through the hallways as you bite your nails. In a world where humans lived in fear of gigantic beasts that ruled supreme, you had the misfortune of being captured and forced to serve one of these very gigantic beasts.

Your supreme ruler was named Janine and she was a 675ft tall vampire bat. You encountered her when she invaded your village in order to quell her monstrous hunger. You only survived because she was too full to eat you and instead took you back to her citadel. You had to beg her not to devour you or drain you dry and the bat giantess allowed you to live only as long as you served her. In all the time you served her, you had realized you had become a vampire’s servant like out of a horror movie. Your jobs involved maintenance of the citadel and finding food for the vampire bat lady. Janine had put on a lot of weight from her insatiable appetite that only got larger as time went on. You were beginning to fear for your life that she’d eat you on the spot just out of sheer hunger.

You reach the end of the hallway and you walk underneath the door that leads to your mistress’s chamber. But as you’re almost in Janine’s room, you realize that the sun hadn’t gone down yet and if you woke Janine up too soon, she’d be furious. Vampire bats were not hurt by the sunlight but they still hated it as much as actual vampires. Last time you woke Janine up too early, she left you in her armpit 5 hours straight. Then again, you remember that Janine also doesn’t like to be woken up too late. The last time you woke her up three minute late, she sat her huge butt on top of you for seven hours straight. The fact was that she a stickler for details, which made it extremely difficult to avoid her wrath. You wait for two minutes and then you realize that you’ve waited enough and then walk into the room.

It is a regal looking chamber with candles and bright red curtains in the walls. You look and see your mistress snoring away as she hung upside-down. Janine was a rather large vampire bat with tan yellowish fur all over her body and long pink haired that looked like it was stained with blood (how it stayed seated when she was upside down, you had no idea). She also had a blue tattoo of a bat’s head under her left eye and blue membranes attached to her wings. She wore a bright red regal looking vest with gold highlight and tight blue spandex pants. She was also enormous, due to her constant feeding frenzies. Janine was in fact, so large that you were surprised that she could still fly. However, your job was not to point out her weight, but to wake her up.”

You climb the ladder in the wall towards the ceiling and climb your way up towards where your mistress is snoozing away. First you climb down Janine’s large sausage-like toes and then you climb down her large hips, down her big belly that was contained somehow by her massive winged arms and then you climb down her several chins before maneuvering up to one of her ears. You really hope that your timing was good. If you didn’t wake the vampire bat giantess up at exactly the right time, you were in big trouble. You then clear your throat before you make your way up to the bat woman’s ear. “Wake up!” you yell. Then your blood freezes because one of Janine’s green eyes just springs open wide and then rolls in your direction, leading you to fear for your own safety.
1322.title: Legend of the Vampire Bat

1323.content:
You step into the Furious Forest, rifle in hand as you give a confident smile. You had come into the woods to do some hunting, but not just any hunting. You were in for some really BIG game. There had been an infestation of wild boars lately and they were doing a lot of damage to the country side. The boar problem became so bad that the king placed a large bounty on wild boars in order to get the population under control. The bigger the boar, the bigger the bounty. However, the king himself stated that he sometimes thought that it was actually the work of one particularly large and destructive boar rather than a whole herd of boars causing chaos. Of course, that didn’t matter to you, because you came to hunt boars and get paid. “Those little piggies,” you say to yourself. “Are in big trouble now.”
 
You laugh to yourself as you walk into the woods and twirl your rifle. You knew that there were boars to be hunted and you pull out a whistle that makes a pig’s sound, hoping to use it as bait. However, for some reason, the boars don’t come running. This causes you to let out a sigh. “Looks like we’ll be doing things the hard way.” You walk further into the forest and hold your rifle out in case you see any boars. What you do see is a large bounty of truffles and other crops. The sight of the crops makes you wonder why the boars have to leave the forest to steal food from the village. It seemed like there was enough food here for an army of boars. Speaking of which, you rub your chin and you don’t seem to find any sign of a boar.

“That’s strange,” you say. “People said that there was an infestation of wild boars. But I haven’t seen even one.” You walk further into the forest and still see no boars. You were beginning to think that the damage might have actually been done by a bear or by rats. Then again, as far as you knew, there weren’t any boars in the forest to begin with before these strange attacks. As you continue to walk on, you don’t know it, but you pass by a rather strange purple truffle that was as big as a tree stump and from the looks of it, it had a few bites taken out of it. But what you do come across startles you. There is a rather large foot print, as big as a carriage and from the looks of it, it was made by a boar. You give a whistle and then you crack a smile. “That print must belong to a giant of a boar. I’m going to be rich.” With that, you rush off with your rifle, determined to catch this mysterious boar.

As you keep on running, you see a shadow of a rather strange creature and realize that you must be on the right track. You see a shadowed out image of a boar’s head and smile. “Gotcha.” You hold out your rifle and fire, expecting to fell the boar. However, the bullet just bounces off of the boar and causes it to squeal. “What the?” you ask. You then hear snarling and the boar turns around and rises to its full height. iIt was there that you look up in surprise because this was no ordinary boar you had shot. This wild boar was 650ft tall and was actually an anthropomorphic wild boar woman. She had bright purple skin with long white hair and sharp yellow teeth with four large tusks. She wore nothing but a chainmail bikini and a red leather jacket as well as a pair of tinted pink sunglasses as she looks down on you and snorts.

“You interrupted my meal, human.” You continue to look up at this enormous boar lady in surprise. “A talking boar?” you ask. “You must be worth millions.” The boar woman notices your rifle and the fat creature gives a snorting laugh. “Flattery will get you nowhere and that silly toy doesn’t scare me at all.” You give a smirk. “Well, I’ve got news for you, piggy. The king is paying a bounty for the wild boar that are ravaging the countryside.” The boar lady scoffs. “Wild boar. Singular. I’m the only boar in this entire forest.” “That’s good enough for me,” you say. “More bounty for me.” You fire again, but the bullet bounces harmlessly off the boar lady’s skin. You try to shoot again, but you’re out of bullets.

 The giant pig lady reaches down and grabs your rifle before tossing it into her mouth and eating it, to your surprise. “Well,” snorted the boar lady. “It appears the predator has become the prey. But I’m a reasonable porcine. I’ll give you a chance to make up for it. You become my servant and I won’t eat you.” The boar woman gives another laugh as she looks down at you.
1323.title: Hunting Boar Can Be Dangerous

13231.content:
The enormous purple boar lady looks down at you and snorts as she lowers her head and then adjusts her sunglasses. You step back but the boar holds up her foot and presses down on you as you grunt and completely immobilizes you as she lets out a squealing laugh. "So what do you say?" asks the pig woman. "The hunter has so quickly become the prey. So what's it going to be, hunter? I'm the predator now. Will you serve me or serve my stomach." You're terrified but then you try to apply some bravado in an attempt to intimidate the enormous pig lady. "Oh yeah! How do I know that you're not bluffing." The boar woman smiles and shows you her sharp and yellow teeth and then extends her tongue. You see that her back teeth are littered with what look like broken human skulls. You then look up in fear as the boar woman picks her teeth with her chubby claws.

"Ugh," says the boar as her stumble gurgles. "Listen. You humans don't exactly agree with me and I wouldn't have to munch on so many human hunters if they would leave me alone. Now, if you insist on antagonizing me, I'll repeat myself. Either become my servant or just step into my mouth now." The boar giantess extends her tongue and then the giantess breathes her putrid mushroom breath on you and you shiver. Somehow that bounty on wild boars isn't worth the trouble you assumed it would be and you begin to sweat. You really didn't want to become the servant to such an enormous pig. But you also didn't want to end up in a giant pig's stomach and you let out a groan. "I submit." You say.

The boar smirks and then reveals a gourd at the side of her bikini bottom and then drops you inside before putting a cork in the gourd and then stomping away. "You're making a wise decision. That actually benefits the both of us." You could not believe it. You came here to collect a bounty on the wild boars that have been terrorizing the countryside and now an abnormally large wild sow had collected you. "This is humiliating." You groan. The boar scoffs. "It beats being digested." "How did you get so big in the first place?"

The pig giantess gave a grunt and then paused to bend over and eat a patch of mushrooms as big as tree stumps. "You might have noticed that there are some rather unusual mushrooms around these parts. I don't know where they come. Some people think that some wizard or witch put a curse on them, some think that it was some kind of strange potion or pollutant that mixed in with the soil or maybe they're just an undiscovered species. Who knows?" The boar then walks underneath a waterfall and crouches down as the water comes down and you hold your ears as it rushes. "Long story short," says the big pig lady. "The mushrooms are toxic to humans but they make animals super huge and able to speak." The boar then walks out from under the waterfall and whistles as she goes on her merry way.

2 hours pass and the boar takes the gourd out of her belt and then she shakes it to dump you into her hand. You grunt as you land in your mistress's palm and you look and see she has brought you to a large...
13231.title: Boar Necessities

133.content:
You wake up to a strange sound that sounds an awful lot like mooing. You spring up and yell before you land on your two feet. You then look and see that you're wearing a toga of some sort, strait out of ancient Greece. You give a mutter of confusion. "This isn't the toga I was wearing earlier." You then look around and see that there are large brick walls as big as skyscrapers and there appeared to be torches jutting out of the wall that served as the only source of light. You walk further and further to see where you are. “This looks like an ancient underground temple. Where am I anyway? I remember being in Athens but after that, it’s a blank.

You walk for 20 minutes and come across the end of a wall but then you see that there is another wall to the side connected to the previous wall and up ahead in front of you, there is another wall. “Huh?” you ask. You shrug your shoulders and then start to walk again. After 30 minutes, you see that those two walls connected to another wall in front of you that appeared to be a dead end of sorts. “What the?” you ask. “What is this place?” If you didn’t know better, you’d say you were in an enormous maze. You look up and see that there is what looks like a ginormous mirror above the wall in front of you. You pay it no mind and walk the other way.

After 40 more minutes of walking, your legs are sore and you’re almost ready to collapse. You come across another fork in the “hallway” and look to see nothing but bricks everywhere. As you’re grumbling, you look and see what looks like a giant amphora that was as big as 3 houses stacked together. “Okay,” you say. “Now things are starting to get really weird. Exactly where am I? What is this strange place?” But you’re too tired to care and you then proceed to sit down to take a rest. If you didn’t know better, you’d say you were on a rug of some kind, but you disregard it.

You stay dormant for 15 whole minutes and you’re about to fall asleep when you hear a rumbling sound. “What the?!” you yell. “Now I have to deal with an earthquake too?!” The quake becomes more and more violent as it comes closer and then you see something slamming down in front of you. From the looks of it, it was a large bright red colored hoof. You look up in shock because there is a giant 700ft tall woman in front of you. She is an anthropomorphic African buffalo with long blonde hair and bright bluish black fur. She was very obese with a belly that reached her knees and a large backside and an udder as big as her head. The buffalo lady wore Amazon-style armor with a golden breastplate, tiara and ruby earrings with gold bracelets around her arms and legs. She was also wearing a pair of rectangular glasses as she looks down on you with a smirk and shakes her tail.

“Well, well, well,” says the enormous bovine. “A human in the labyrinth of the great and powerful Alejandra. Now, there are two possibilities. Either you have been chosen to be my servant, tending to my every whim. Or...” The buffalo giantess licks her lips, frightening you in the process as she tend taps her enormous belly. “Another possibility is that you’ve come to offer yourself to one of my four stomachs.” You panic and bow down. “Servant! Definitely servant!” Alejandra lets out a noblewoman’s laugh. “Oh, good,” she says. “It’s about time I caught one. Now, I know exactly what you’ll be doing for your first chore.”

You give a gulp...
133.title: Lady in the Labyrinth

1331.content:
Alejandra sits down on her enormous rear, creating a violent echo that resonates through the entire labyrinth and nearly knocks you off of your feet. "Now," says Alejandra with a smug smile. "For your first official chore as my servant, you are going to massage my hooves." The buffalo giantess holds out one of her large hooves and it emits a foul smell that messes up your sense of smell and for an entire minute, causes your eyesight to go fuzzy. "Holy cow." You grunt. Alejandra gives a snort. "What was that, human?" she asks, sounding almost offended and almost flattered at your choice of words. You give a nervous laugh. "Nothing, mistress."

You look and see that Alejandra's hooves appear to be made of solid gold and as you get to work rubbing her left hoof, Alejandra kicks back and relaxes and takes out what appears to be a barn-sized bar of chocolate and leisurely begins to eat it as you continue to massage her titanic foot. You begin to wonder how you got in the labyrinth in the first place. Why was it so big in here and why was there such an enormous buffalo woman who appears to like turning humans into her loyal servants. You fight the stench of Alejandra's feet and then you begin to think of what the situation reminds you of.

In ancient Greece there was a monster called the minotaur that was half man and half bull and ate human flesh. It was put under control by being sealed away in a large maze known as the labyrinth. You must've been in an alternate world where Alejandra was the stand in for the mighty minotaur. Although, you had no idea why a minotaur would be as big as Alejandra. Alejandra finishes her chocolate and then opens up what looks to be a scroll of some kind. You're guessing that you were not only trapped in an alternate world, you had somehow gone back in time.

Then something occurs to you. Every 7 years or so, there was a routine sacrifice of young men and women to the minotaur. Perhaps you were a sacrifice meant specifically for Alejandra, but you have no idea what you would have done to have deserved to be a sacrifice. From the looks of it, Alejandra had no interest of leaving the labyrinth. Perhaps if you could find a way outside of this twisting and turning trap, you could get away from Alejandra and figure out a way to get back home.

It was at that moment that...
1331.title: Hooves of the Buffalo

1332.content:
The story starts in a museum where there are several treasures on display, found in North and South America. One particular artifact that stood out was a bright turquoise statue of a coyote. It was after closing time at the moment and the lights went out. The statue shined even in the darkness and all security cameras in the museum were turned on in the event that a would-be thief would attempt to break in and steal the artifact on display. A lone security guard is ever vigilant, keeping his eyes out as he looks at the screens. However, even the most diligent guards are not perfect and as soon as the clock strikes midnight, the ever vigilant but also ever so tired guard falls asleep on his chair.

This was the moment you were looking for as you cut open the window to enter the museum and walk through the hallway. You were what most people would call, a thief and you knew somebody who had a collection of rare and not to mention, stolen antiques that they had hidden away and would pay through the nose to expand. “It doesn’t get any easier than this,” you say to yourself with a snicker. “This stinking museum only has one guard. I’ll be in and out and nobody will be the wiser.”  As you walk in, you take out a black sharpie to draw on the security cameras so as not to be detected in case the guard woke up. You walk in where they keep the turquoise and begin to fill your thief bag with as much treasure as you can carry.

“With all this loot on display,” you think to yourself as you go on your greedy way. “There’s bound to be something here my employer will want for their collection. Besides, if they don’t like it, I could always sell it to the black market.” You take great pride in your work and feel like nothing can stop you. It is at that exact moment that you see an even more valuable looking prize; namely the turquoise coyote statue in the center of the room. “Ooh,” you say. “I’ll bet that thing is the most valuable of them all. They’ll surely like that.”

You’re about to make a move when you suddenly stop and then use an aerosol to reveal the bright red laser lights that were protecting the coyote statue. “Huh,” you scoff. “Don’t they ever learn.” You take out several mirrors and position them specifically to redirect the lights. Once all the lasers were dealt with, you whistle and calmly walk up to the case. You take out your glass cutters again and then you slice your way through the glass case. “Come to Papa.” You say as you reach in and grab the coyote statue. However, some ancient treasures can often come with a curse, usually of the costly variety. The moment you grab the coyote, in a flash, you disappear, leaving your stolen loot behind.

The next thing you know, you are in some strange painted desert with sands coming in bright shades of red, brown, yellow and blue with a bright purple sky overhead and what looks like a moon that had eyes and blinked as it hovered in the air. You see jagged cactuses that looked like somebody painted them and then blinked. “What happened?” you ask. “I had the statue! What’s going?!” As you’re ranting, a large shadow is cast upon you and you turn and look in fright. Standing in front of you was an enormous and chubby-looking anthropomorphic coyote woman with dark turquoise blue fur with red and yellow highlights on both her hips and her neck. She had long silver hair and she smirked down at you with sharp teeth.

“Oh good,” says the coyote giantess to you. “You’re here already. I was expecting you later. Oh well, can’t complain. Now, you can start by pulling cactuses out of my fur.” As you stare at the coyote giantess dumbfounded, she turned around and holds down her tail to show a sea of those strange cacti, no doubt stuck in her fur when she was walking through the desert. You definitely stole from the wrong museum.
1332.title: Curse of the Coyote

14.content:
You let out a groan and then you open your eyes. “Oh,” you grunt as you hold your head. “Oh man. What happened?” You then look around and see acres and acres of sand up all around. The sand glows in hues of reds, yellows and purples. You see what appears to be a camel spider crawling across the ground and you gasp as you hold your head. “How did I end up in a desert?” you ask as you feel your head. “It’s a blank.” You step forward through the sand and you see something glowing up ahead. It shined like gold and you run forward to see what it is. All you could tell was that whatever it was, it was almost completely buried underneath the thick golden red sand.

As you’re running, you fail to notice that you’re passing by a ridge of some sort that appeared to be shaped like a ribcage and looked like bones painted a dustier color by the raging sandstorms. Up ahead, you see clouds in the distance and what look like two mountains that were completely covered by shadows. “Huh?” you ask. “That’s odd. I didn’t think there would be mountains in this desert. From the looks of it, this clearly isn’t an American desert.” What was it that made you convinced this was no American desert? The answer was simple. You didn’t see a single cactus in the area and there appeared to be what looked like a cobra’s skin blowing in the wind. Clearly you were in an old world desert of some sort. The only thing to guide you was that glowing sparkle up in the sand.

By the time you reach the sparkle in the sand, you look down and see that the sparkling light was coming from what looked like a silver tassel. “A tassel?” you ask. You then pull on the tassel and see that it was attached to a carpet that was made up of a red square inside a blue square inside a yellow square inside of a white square inside of a pink square. The carpet was in tatters and had what looked like a giant hole in the center of it.

It was at this point you remember where you saw this carpet. You were looking for a carpet for your dorm room after your previous carpet was ruined by a leaking tube of purple paint. While in the carpet store, you saw this very carpet being throw into a dumpster. You were wondering who would throw out such a perfectly good carpet and decided to try and take it for yourself. However, as soon as you picked up the carpet, it fluttered violently and from what you could remember, it was some sort of magic carpet. It must’ve brought you to this strange desert in the first place. Unfortunately, from the looks of it, it crash-landed and you couldn’t use it to fly your way back home.

As you hold up the remains of the carpet, you let out a sigh. “Well,” you say. “It doesn’t look like I’ll be flying home. I’ve got to get out of this desert.” You begin to walk through the desert looking for any sign of civilization. Unfortunately, after an hour, your search is as fruitless as ever and you pant and gasp as the heat begins to get to you. “Forget civilization,” you say to yourself. “Water is what I need.” As you’re panting, you hear buzzing. You see a fly buzzing and you’re about to swat it but then you remember, insects need water to survive too. Following the fly may be more beneficial than killing it. You decide to run after the fly and as you continue to follow it, you see that in the distance there are those two bright reddish purple-covered mountains again and they appear to be shifting.

You were too thirsty to care at that point and just continue to follow the fly until you reach what looks like a lush green oasis with a large pool of water that looked as big as a river. You gasp and then you start to drink as much water as you can. As you continue to drink the water, you hear some slight earthquakes and then you see the water rippling as an enormous shadow is cast over you. You look up and gasp because those two red violet mountains were not mountains after all. They were the humps of a 695ft tall anthropomorphic camel woman with red-violet fur and long silvery pink hair. Her arms were heavily muscular and she had well-toned abs, albeit with a very large and stout stomach that looked like it belonged on a sumo wrestler. The camel giantess was dressed as a belly dancer with a crystal necklace that looked like it was made of bejeweled eyes. Similar decorations hung on her skirt.

As you’re dumbfounded, the camel giantess steps into the water and then looks down at you. She gives a big smile before she winks at you and bends down to pick you up.
14.title: The Oasis

142.content:
It happened long ago when mankind’s careless destruction of a world parallel to Earth became too much for the world itself to take. A catastrophic event unfurled and the animal kingdom was transformed into giant lifeforms with the ability to walk, talk and think like humans. Humanity’s military was no match for these giants and they were quickly overpowered by the very beings that were once threatened by mankind’s misdeeds. The best case scenario was for humans to end up as pets to the titans. As for the worst case scenario, some titans enslaved the conquered humans and treated them cruelly. For the smaller lifeforms, their fate was a gamble.

Fortunately for you, fortune was rather kind. You were the pet of a rather large but very benevolent titan. Her name was Elizabeth and she was a 800ft tall anthropomorphic tapir. She had orange-yellow-colored skin with orange-red stripes and spots and long midnight black colored hair. You didn’t know her exact age but you suspected she was somewhere in her mid twenties. She was very large in body shape as well. Elizabeth had an apple figure with a large round behind but the biggest part of her was her enormous belly that entered a room a minute before she did. While Elizabeth was mildly clumsy and somewhat oblivious, she was far from abusive and treated you more like a friend than a servant.

At that moment, you were sleeping blissfully when Elizabeth’s alarm clock went off. You spring up and run to turn it off, but have trouble manipulating the switch because of A) how tiny you are B) the fact that the clock was an old model. “You’d think that Elizabeth would’ve bought a better clock by now.” You say with a grunt. “Whoa!” You finally manage to shut off the clock and let out a sigh. But to your surprise, Elizabeth wasn’t in bed. From the looks of it, she was already getting dressed for work. You take a look at the clock and see that it’s only 2:00 a.m.” You give a blink. “I still don’t know why Elizabeth has to go to work so early. Come to think about it, where does that mistress of mine work?” In all the years Elizabeth has owned you, you had no idea where she worked. All you knew was that it paid reasonably well and that it required her to punch in at a rather unreasonable hour. Then again, tapirs were nocturnal.”

You let out a sigh and decide to drop the matter and walk back to your bed next to the clock, but you’re so tired that you don’t pay attention to where you’re going and fall down screaming into Elizabeth’s bed as you land with a grunt. “Oof!” You let out a sigh. At least it’s soft. You’re so tired that you lay down where you are just as Elizabeth stomps in. Your tapir mistress was already dressed in a tight black tanktop that could only hide a quarter of her belly and her skin-tight blue jeans. She was getting ready to put on her light blue jacket. As she does so, you feel a shadow cast over you. Unfortunately for you, Elizabeth didn’t turn the light on as she was getting dressed and before you can react, she sits down on top of you and you let out a muffled scream as Elizabeth sits on you. Fortunately both her behind and the bed are soft enough that you aren’t crushed.

As Elizabeth is putting her jacket on, she sees your bed and blinks. “Now where did that human of mine go?” she asks herself. “Listen, I’m going to work now. I’ll be back later. I left some fruit out for your breakfast. Please behave yourself while I’m gone, wherever you are. Love you.” With that, Elizabeth heads off to work with you unknowingly plastered in the center of her rear, stuck but still alive as you try to shake yourself free. Before you know it, Elizabeth is out the door and you’re both on your way to wherever it is she works.
142.title: One Titanic Tapir

choices: Come out and hope Rita is reasonable
Stay put and hope for the best
143.content:
“Really? Sneaking out again? You know this doesn’t work, right?”

Hiding behind the leg of a giant chair, you gulp in fear. Rita sounded more amused than angry at finding your empty cage…that was never a good sign.

Rita was the 100-foot Rhino woman who owned you. Humans were barely mouse-sized to anthros, and were treated as either slaves, or food. You used to belong to a pet store, but your constant escape attempts had nearly driven the zebra shopkeeper crazy. He’d just been about to eat you when Rita came and bought you dirt-cheap.


That’s why she’d bought you—you were the only human she could afford. (That, and she enjoyed toying with you, and coming up with punishments for all your escape attempts. She especially enjoyed sitting on you.)


You hear Rita chuckle, and cringe at the sound.. Her thundering footsteps approach her living room, where you were hiding. It’s not long before she stomps into the room, and you can’t help but peek out from behind the chair leg to catch a glimpse of your titanic rhino mistress.

Rita was, you had to admit, a bombshell. She was very plump—nicely round and curvy in all the right places, with a chest and rear to die for. And NOT obese or slobby-looking, just plump. Her light-grey hide even looked great with the bright pink bikini she was wearing...even if her girth made it look like it was painted on.

“You may as well come out, Squirt,” Rita says as she slowly walks into the room, shaking her hips. “You know I’ll find you eventually. But if you want to hide, that’s fine. I could use some more fun.” She giggles, pretending to look under an old coffee table. She was toying with you, and enjoying every second of it.

You swear under your breath. Rita had been out swimming with her friends today, and you had slipped out of your cage to look for a way to escape her apartment. You’d spent hours looking for a crack in the wall or an open window; expecting Rita to be gone all day… but unfortunately for you she’d come home early and found your empty cage.


The floor shakes beneath you as Rita taps her foot. “I’m waiting, Squirt. If you come out now, I’ll go easy on you. If you don’t…” she giggles and slaps her large belly. “...At least make the chase fun, ‘kay?”

You curse under your breath. What to do?
143.title: Rita the Rhino

choices: She sits on you (her usual favorite)
She makes you massage her feet
She squeezes you between her breasts
1431.content:
You think about making a run for it--maybe Rita wouldn't catch you easily? She seemed pretty caught up in taunting you; maye you could bolt while she was distracted? If she'd left the door open, you could even escape!

...No. That was stupid. Her modest apartment wasn't that big, she could cross the living room at a stroll faster than you could run; you’d be caught in seconds. You should have bolted while she had been in her bedroom, looking at your empty cage.
Stupid, stupid, stupid.

“Pleeease?” Rita coos mockingly, bending over to look behind a faded old sofa. Her back was to you, giving you a view of her wide, multi-ton rump--which you often found yourself flattened under. “If you just come out, I might be reasonable. Heck, I might NOT sit on you this time! Clock is ticking, Squirt!”

You kick yourself. There was no way out, was there? Might as well get it over with.

You walk out from behind the chair and stand on the carpet (which at your size was like a plush landscape), and wait for Rita to turn around….trying not to cringe at the sight of the giant rhino-booty above you.

It isn't long before Rita stands up and turns from the couch--and immediately spots you. “There you are, Squirt! See, isn't this better than some chase around the house? Especially since you broke my favorite coffee mug in our last chase...I was so mad I almost ate ya!”

She reaches down and pinches your form between two fingers, lifting you up to her smirking face. “Good to see you're wising up--you know to listen to your mistress, like a good pet should.”

“I’m so proud,” you snark.

“Hmph. Need some work on that attitude, though,” Rita scolds, smirking even wider. She always enjoyed bantering with you. “Of course, since you broke out of your cage again, I’ll have to teach you a lesson. But I think I’ll go easy on you this time.” She gives you a saucy wink, “You may even enjoy it, Squirt!”

You gulp. What was Rita going to do this time?
1431.title: Reasonable Rita?

14311.content:
Rita shakes her large hips, her smirk widening. “Well, since I’m going easy on you, Squirt; I think I won’t get creative this time. I’ll just go with my old favorite!”

Immediately, you start struggling in her grasp. “You are NOT sitting on me, Rita!”

The rhino woman giggles and begins walking back to her room. “Yes, I am. What are you gonna do, stop me? Besides, It’s been too long since I sat on a human in my bikini--when I’m in jeans, I can barely feel you squirming under there. They fit too loose for that.”

“EVERYTHING you put on your fat ass is stretched so tight it looks like it was painted on!” You keep up the struggling, but her grip remains tight as ever.

Rita didn’t even look down at you. “To a human, it may look like that. But what do you little guys know about fashion?”

Rita stomped into her bedroom. It was pretty modest by anthro standards--a single large window was in the wall by the rather large bed; a single bedside table next to it. A lamp, an alarm clock and your open cage were crammed onto the table, and some posters of anthro movies decorated the walls, mostly near the closet. To Rita, it was small; but to you it was big as a warehouse.

You stop struggling and look around, confused. “Why are we in here? You change your mind and want me to make your bed instead of sitting on me?” Rita’s bed was already made, but you figured you should get a few more wisecracks in before your punishment.

With her free hand, Rita picked up a pillow and plopped in down in the center of the bed. “Those tiny ears of yours having trouble, Squirt? Like I said, I’m going easy on you this time. Normally I’d drop you in a chair and sit on you--if you were really bad, one without a cushion--but this time you’ll have a nice soft bed under you when the Pink Doom drops on ya.”

“Great. Now I’ll only be flat as a pancake when you’re done, instead of flat as paper like usual. You’re such a fair mistress.” You try and hide your fear despite the snarking. By Rita’s laugh, you failed.

She lifts you over the pillow, dangling you upside down by the leg. Her smile is from ear to ear, and she even shakes her rump in glee. “Thanks, Squirt!”

Rita lets go and you fall onto the giant pillow, sinking in with hardly a bounce. The thing was surprisingly soft, even comfortable. But that comfort goes out the window when Rita turns around, and you’re treated to the all-too-familiar sight of her titanic, bikini-clad rhinoceros booty hovering over your tiny form. She turns her head and smirks at you, and after a wink, lets her mass--and ass--drop on you.

The world goes dark. Insane pressure slams into your entire body and you feel the pillow flatten as you vanish completely under Rita’s behind, her great weight pressing you down into the mattress that creaked under her mass. Instinct kicks in and you begin flailing about, uselessly trying to push the crushing posterior off you; squirm out from under her...but Rita’s sheer weight, and the pliant fat on her butt kept you pinned. The bikini was even too slick to get a good grip on.

Above, Rita sighs in bliss at your struggles. She starts wiggling her behind and grinding down on you, dragging your form back and forth across the pillow. It wasn’t as intense as the other times she’d sat on you, and the softness of the pillow and bed did take the edge of the worst of the pain. Maybe Rita was really going easy on you this time. You still want to scream, but keep your mouth closed: you’d learned the hard way that screaming just got you an open mouth full of rhino flab, and biting Rita’s rear didn’t do anything but tickle her cheeks.

Or rather, cheek. Wait, what? You move your arms as best you can, and just barely feel an edge of Rita’s cheek--and the space between it and the other one. Rita moans and you recoil, but it was true: she’d moved to the side a bit, mostly pinning you under ONE cheek this time, rather than feeling the wrath of both orbs. Another reason her wiggles and grinds were less agonizing than normal: without getting chewed between two cheeks, there was less force.

...And since you weren’t directly under her crack this time, you wouldn’t be at ground zero of any gas. Rita had farted while sitting on you a few times. One time, you lost your sense of smell for a week. NOT being in the direct path of flatulence was quite the blessing, especially given an anthro who like sitting on humans as much as Rita did.

Rita really WAS going easy on you. But, having a multi-ton rhino giantess sit on you was still quite painful, especially if you put up with it for almost ten whole minutes.

By the time Rita gets up, after wiggling down on you one last time, you’re dazed and barely conscious--and pinned to her cheek like a human sticker. She peels you off and holds you up to her smirking face. “Well Squirt, I think you’ve learned your lesson for today.”

You give a thumbs-down. You’re not quite angry enough to give her the finger, since the punishment was slightly less bad than usual.

“Aww, see? You’re even getting more polite! Anyway, now that your punishment is over, I’ve got good news. See, the girls and I were all having fun swimming; but then Lisa--you know, the alligator? She had the idea that we could all meet up at her place and have some fun with our humans together! That’s why I came home so early.”

“And then we had our ‘fun’,” you mumble. Great, now you would have to deal with a whole gang of anthro giantesses; and the humans they’d probably scared into compliance and servitude. “Alright...what’s gonna happen to me?”
Rita laughs. “Oh, that’s the best part, Squirt...us ladies are gonna have a slumber party, just like when we were kids! And bring our humans to play with--don’t worry, I’ll try and make sure Lisa doesn’t eat you.”

You groan. Just perfect. A whole night surrounded by giantesses. You wished Rita was still sitting on you.
14311.title: The Old Favorite

143111.content:
You'd spent the past few hours Rita spent getting ready trying to escape your cage again, but this time without success. Rita had spotted your efforts and since she didn't have time to punish you, she just threw you in her purse and snapped it shut, leaving you with nothing but beauty products for company. Even if you couldn't see, Rita kept you up-to-date every step of the way, like some kind of cheerful doomsday clock.

"And now we're on our way! Isn't this fun, Squirt? You must be so excited! You'll get to see all your friends again!"

"The ones who've survived until now," you mumbled.

Rita shrugged and made a noncommittal noise, neither confirming nor denying anything. Somehow she was able to hear you despite your size and confinement. She may be a rhino but you swore she had the ears of a bat. It was just one of the many reasons you'd never been able to escape from her. You kept up your escape attempts in her purse, but Rita paid no attention, and you realized it was because escape from this purse was impossible.

"Keep struggling all you want, Squirt. That just makes me want to play more at the party!"

You gulped and stopped struggling. You knew you'd reached the point of no return when Rita stopped and you heard her knocking on a door. Immediately the door was thrown open and a booming voice yelled out, "PAAAAAAAR-TAAAAAAAAAAAY!"

You winced at the noise. You recognized that voice and shuddered.

"Hi Lisa!" Rita said cheerfully. "Great idea you had for tonight! We're going to have such fun!"

"Tell me about it," Lisa said. "I have so many ideas planned for our tiny toys, tonight!"

"Uh-huh... And how many of those ideas involve eating them?"

Lisa huffed in mock outrage. "I am shocked. Shocked and offended you would accuse me of inviting my best friends in the whole world over, just so I could use their tinies as free food... Speaking of mouthwatering morsels, did you bring our appetizing, little escape artist?"

"Yes, Lisa," Rita said patiently. "He's right here. But don't eat him. I'm not like you, I'm not made of money. I can't afford to buy humans in bulk."

"Yeah, yeah, yeah," Lisa said impatiently. "Let's see him!"

Rita sighed and opened her purse. You cowered beneath your mistress's giant hand and tried to avoid her grasp. She plucked you up easily and displayed you in her palm. Rita looked gorgeous tonight--or at least as gorgeous as any non-human could be. She wore a pink tank-top and black yoga pants showing off her shapely assets.

However, it was the sight of the other anthro that had you quivering in her palm. Unlike Rita, who could be described as pleasantly plump but was still a bombshell, Lisa was obese. Her skin was bright green and she was dressed in a kind of goth, punk-rock style. Her black hair was short and messy with purple highlights. She wore heavy black eye shadow and painted black lips. When she saw you, she salivated, running her massive pink tongue over her lips.

The alligator held an opened beer can in her hand and was obviously already drunk. When she spoke the smell of alcohol wafted over you like a gale-force wind.

"Oh he looks positively scrumptious!" Lisa said, advancing. Rita recognized the hungry look in her eyes and pulled you away from her friend quickly.

"Lisa! What did I just say?"

"Sorry, sorry," Lisa said, blushing. "Something about his smell in particular... I don't know why, but it drives me crazy like no other!"

"Well keep it to yourself for now. I've grown attached to this one, and if you eat him, you'll pay for it out the nose."

"It'd be worth it," Lisa murmured, then saw the angry gleam in Rita's eyes and backed off. "Ok, ok, I'll do my best. Pinkie promise," she said, extending her purple-painted pinkie. Rita rolled her eyes but shook her friend's claw. "Come on," Lisa said, "the rest of the girls are already here."

Still shaking from your ordeal with Lisa, Rita carried you into her friend's apartment. Unlike Rita's home, Lisa's apartment was far bigger and more expensive. Sitting on the couch in the living room was Lisa's little sister, Kelly. Other than both being hundred foot tall alligators, the siblings were completely opposite. Where Lisa was fat, Kelly was tall and slender. Where Lisa was slovenly and dressed to party, Kelly was well-groomed and dressed like they were meeting for a book club, with a turtle-neck sweater and small glasses. Lisa was a boisterous party animal, while Kelly was a shy bookworm. She waved meekly at Rita as she entered.

You'd heard from Rita that the alligator sisters came from money. It was why they could afford such a nice apartment, and why Lisa could go threw humans like bags of potato chips and still have money to spare.

There were two other anthros you recognized reclining in the room. One was a cow with red spots almost as fat as Lisa. She had long, pink hair in bright curls and a dress so bright it was almost blinding. Her name was Sue. She was probably the sweetest and kindest anthro you ever met. She was also one of the deadliest. Sue was a total ditz and a complete klutz who didn't know her own strength. While she babied the humans she kept as pets, her carelessness had caused more than a few... accidents. She almost went through humans as fast as Lisa.

You recognized the tiny she held in her hand and was cooing baby-talk to. His name was Pickles. It wasn't his real name, no more than your name was Squirt, but it was the only thing Sue let him be called. Somehow he'd survived longer than all her other pets combined. You weren't sure if that was better or worse for him. Right now Sue was using brushing his long hair which she'd grown out and painted pink like a doll's. He looked ready to die of embarrassment.

The other anthro you saw was seated back on a recliner, with her paws propped in the air. She was a golden-furred lioness with white hair in a long braid. She was dressed in red-silk pajamas. She had even more of a bombshell figure than Rita, but while you could tell Rita was playful just by looking at her, the lioness's demeanor was haughty and proud.

Her name was Clarice. Like the alligator sisters she came from money. Unlike the sisters, she made you know just how superior said money made her. As she reclined in her seat, several tiny humans catered to her every whim. Two massage the paws of her feet, one was painting her fingernails pink, and another was balanced precariously on the edge of her drink, stirring it with a straw and trying his best not to plummet into the drink below. You knew from experience that if he fell, she wouldn't fish him out before her next sip. Humans were expendable to her. In fact, you didn't recognize a single human worshipping her right now. That didn't bode well for them.

"Nice of you to finally join us," Clarice said coolly, even though Rita wasn't even a minute late.

Your mistress scowled. She and the lioness were only "friends" by association. Any night they could go without tearing into each other was considered a win in your book, especially since Clarice made it no secret that if she didn't care about Rita's feelings, she certainly didn't give a crap about your welfare. Sometimes you were positive she'd get rid of you just to spite your owner.

So the guests consisted of an anthro who'd made it clear she'd gobble you up in a heartbeat, one who was likely to "play" with you to death, and one who viewed you as an insect to be crushed. Kelly seemed alright, but you didn't know her well enough to trust her, especially since she always came across as more of a doormat to her gluttonous sister. Right now, Rita--the one who made a game of smooshing you beneath her massive behind--was the lesser evil you had to concern yourself with.

Tonight was not looking good.

"Alright ladies!" Lisa slurred. "Now that everyone's here, the festivities can BEGIN! We got a long night ahead of us and we're not gonna spend a second of it sleeping! Let's start this party off with a bang! How about we play a game of..."
143111.title: Slumber Party

1431111.content:
"... Truth or dare?" Lisa finished.

Clarice sighed and rolled her eyes. "Truth or dare? Really Lisa? What are we, twelve?"

Rita puffed up her cheeks and crossed her arms. Unfortunately, she'd forgotten about you, leaving you pressed tightly against her bosom.

"Tonight's supposed to be fun, Clarice," Rita huffed. "Why'd you even bother coming over if you didn't want to play games?"

"I wouldn't expect someone like you to understand, Rita," Clarice said. "When I accepted this invitation, I expected a certain air of sophistication for tonight's gathering."

The lioness's point was undercut by Lisa chugging the remainder of her beer, belching loudly, and then crushing the can against her forehead. "ALRIGHT!" she said like she hadn't even heard her friends arguing. "LET'S DO THIS! Everyone sit inna circle, and jus wait while I get my tinys from the pantry."

Lisa waddled off into the kitchen unsteadily. She was hammered. Rita sat on the ground, in a circle with everyone else. Clarice rolled her eyes but scooped up her slaves and joined her friends. Kelly pulled a necklace out from inside her shirt, revealing a tiny human man tied to the end of a golden chain. He was red and sweaty from his time spent tucked away between the thin alligator's cleavage.

You recognized him. Pee-Wee was his name. It was smart of Kelly to keep him on hand at all times. He'd never be safe alone around her sister. Speak of the devil, the heavyset alligator came in a few seconds later, holding two humans in her hand, a crying middle-aged couple. The ground shook when Lisa took her seat between Rita and Kelly.

"Could've sworn I had three of these," she slurred to herself.

"YOU ATE OUR SON THIS MORNING!" the tiny woman wailed, falling to her knees in the alligator's palm.

Lisa looked confused for a second then her eyes lit up and she chuckled. "Oh yeah, the scrawny one with the yellow hair! He was a tasty one! Oh, don't feel bad," Lisa said as the terrified couple cried even harder. "If it makes you feel any better he gave me awful indigestion afterwards. That makes us even, right?" This only made the man and woman cry even harder.

"Awwwwwww, poor widdle hoomuns!" Sue said in sympathetic babytalk. "Did mean, ol' Lisa-wisa send your lil boy to her big tummy? I'm sowwy. I'd never treat you like that. No, I wouldn't, no, I wouldn't. Isn't that right, Pickles?"

"Kill me," the tiny muttered under his breath.

"If we're going to play this silly game, can we get on with it?" Clarice snapped.

"Why, Clarice? Got somewhere more important to be?" Rita asked.

"A'right, a'right, tha's e'nuff," Lisa slurred. "Here's the rules. Dis is Truth or Dare. Rules are simple. One of us asks another a question. If they answer, they gotta tell the truth. If they refuse, the asker gives them a dare instead. However, it's the human that has to do the dare, and they can't refuse!"

You shot Rita a terrified look. The rhino shared your worry. "Um," Rita said, "maybe we should make a rule about the kind of dares the humans have to do. You know, just so they don't accidentally--"

"Don't be shy, Rita," Clarice said. "We all know about your... strained financial situation. I'd be happy to reimburse you for any damage done to your Squirt. We all know he can't cost much."

"Right," Lisa said, not noticing the hatred between her two friends. "You break it, you buy it. Perfectly fair."

"That's settled then," Clarice said smoothly. "Let me go first, Lisa. I have a burning question I've been meaning to ask Rita." Before anyone could object the lioness spoke quickly. "Rita. Truth or dare. How much do you weigh?"

Rita blushed beet red and you swore. Weight was relative here. At your size Rita could've been rail thin and she still would've flattened you like a cartoon sticker if she applied pressure. Compared to Lisa, Rita was practically a model. She really only a little pudge that made her figure even more attractive than less--but you and her both knew that Clarice didn't see it that way. The lioness just wanted to humiliate your owner by fatshaming. You might've even felt bad for your mistress and this high school, drama crap she was being subjected to, but you knew if she refused to answer the question, you'd be the one to pay the price. Maybe you should've taken your chances and hid from her when she was looking for you this morning. You might be paying the price for that now.

"Remember that if you lie," Clarice said, "we have a scale that we can use to determine the truth."

The rhino chewed her lip as she thought. Does she tell them the truth or refuse and force Squirt to do a dare?
1431111.title: Truth or Dare

choices: Clarice concedes. Now it's Rita's turn.
Clarice insists that counts as a lie!
14311111.content:
Rita's eyes flicked down to you, and you give her a quick pleading look. To hell with your pride; you knew any one of these harpies could easily kill you. Even Kelly and Sue could be deadly. If Rita let Clarice's taunting get to her, you likely wouldn't survive the night...or even the next ten minutes.

But then Rita nods, and you feel like cheering! It looked like your mistress was going to swallow her pride and tell the truth.

"Sometime today, Rita," Clarice says haughtily. She flicks a toe, whacking one of the humans massaging her paws in the head and knocking him to the floor. He didn't get up, and the other humans strained to NOT look at his still form.

Rita rolls her eyes. "Last time I went to the doctor, I weighed in at...212 tons, give or take. Happy?"

"Shounds abou' right," Lisa slurred. "She's big, but not, like; really big."

Sue nodded. "I think she's telling the truth. She can sit on Squirt without squishing him, after all; and I weigh more than her. I've sat on some of my humans by accident, and the poor widdle things always get squished like grapes! Like the five yesterday....and one the day before....and some this morning....and I kinda ate some of Lisa's when I first got here. Er, sorry about that." As she spoke, you saw Pickles wince at every mention of Sue's accidental victims. Poor guy must have witnessed them all...

"No biggie," Lisa assured her. "What's a few tinies gone? Oh, and you don't have to pay me back for those. Freebies and whatnot."

Kelly clutched Pee-Wee to her chest protectively at her sister's words. Then she cleared her throat. "I, uh; say she's being truthful."

All eyes turned to Clarice. The lioness looked ready to challenge Rita's claim, but snorted when it was clear she was outnumbered. "...Fine. But just to be safe, let's check the scale, shall we?"

Groans rose up from the giants, but Sue stood up. "I'll get it. Game's called 'Truth or Dare', after all." She waddled off down the hall, her tail knocking some guys who were polishing a coffe table onto the floor. Lisa snatched one up immediately and tossed him into her mouth, swallowing the screaming man whole.

Nobody, not even Kelly or Rita, batted an eye at her eating a human alive.

It wasn't long before Sue returned, carrying the scale. She didn't notice the humans she'd knocked onto the floor...who were all gathered where the cow giantess had been sitting. Naturally, her wide bovine rump crashed down the lot of them; the man vanishing beneath her ass instantly.

Lisa burst out laughing and Sue blushed bright red. "Uh-oh...I felt a crunch. Did I just--"

"Yup! Yer big butt just claimed some more victims!" The fat alligator guffawed.

The other girls' reactions were mixed. Clarice looked haughty, seeming to enjoy Sue's embarrasment. Kelly looked sympathetic, even wincing at the crunching sounds; but still couldn't surpress a giggle.
Rita gave you a look that said, See how lucky you are?

Sue shook off her embarrassment and set the scale down in the middle of the circle. "Anyway...Rita, let's fact-check you!"

Rita set you on her shoulder and stood, stepping onto the scale--being careful to avoid stomping any humans on the floor--and held her breath as the device weighed her. The digital readout flickered for a moment, and then gave its answer:

214.5 TONS.

You and Rita both wince. Two and a half tons over her claim. A lot by your standards, but to anthros it was a small difference.

Clarice chuckled, making Rita wince. "Hmm...not QUITE what you claimed, Rita. Not a big difference, but still....."

What would the lioness do?
14311111.title: Rita Answers Truthfully

choices: Pickles Has to do a Dare
143111111.content:
"Oh come on, Clarice!" Lisa said. "She told ya the truth. Whassa difference two tons make?"

From personal experience, two tons made all the difference in the world, and you were sure the tiny Sue just squashed beneath her bovine bottom would agree had he not been reduced to a stain on her dress. Clarice was annoyed at Lisa's interjection, but she saw that the rest of the girls looked sympathetic towards Rita so she let the matter drop.

"Fine. Close enough... I suppose it's your turn now, Rita," she said reluctantly.

"Oh goodie," Rita said with a nasty smile at the lioness.

"Um, I have a s-suggestion," Kelly said. She had a really quiet voice. Even at your miniscule size you had to strain to hear her.

"Go ahead, Kel. Don't be shy!" Lisa slapped her sister hard on the back sending her reeling forward. The tiny human she kept on a chain let out a wail as he swung forward like a pendulum and then came crashing back with a muffled thud into Kelly's chest. Lisa winced. "Sorry bout that. Oh wait, he's still alive! Good. Anyway, go ahead sis."

"M-maybe there should be a r-rule about waiting a turn before challenging the p-person who a-asked you truth or dare... Otherwise there might be... um... another incident," Kelly said.

You knew exactly what incident Kelly was talking about. It involved another party--not one at the alligator sisters house--but another friend's. You don't remember exactly what set it off--Rita had concealed you in the back of her thong as punishment for another escape attempt--all you knew was that everything went crazy when a fight broke out between Rita and Clarice. It involved a lot of hair-pulling and a lot of tiny human slaves crushed underfoot as two titans brawled. You'd nearly been killed as Rita's cheeks mashed you together. Clarice knocked Rita right on her ass, but your captor had pulled the lion down with her. How you'd survived the pressure of not one but two giants crushing down on you was a miracle you could not explain, but remained eternally grateful for. Not that it hadn't hurt like hell.

"That's probably a good idea," Sue said. "We wouldn't want to accidentally hurt any of our little guys and gals."

You and Rita both face-palmed at the oblivious hypocrisy of that statement but the other girls were nodding.

"Good suggestion, Kel!" Lisa said, making her little sister blush. "Ok, Rita. Ask your question to someone other than Clarice."

Rita frowned and Kelly shrugged apologetically. The rhino sat thinking for a long time.

"Will you be asking your question sometime this century, Ms. 214.5?" Clarice asked snidely.

Rita blushed furiously but then broke out in a smile. You recognized that smile. It was the smile of someone who's about to take great joy in the pain they're about to cause. Once again, you unfortunately knew that from personal experience. The last time Rita smiled like it was just when she caught you trying to climb out the window after she'd just finished eating two cans of beans. The memory of that night made you shudder.

"Sue," Rita said. "Truth or dare. Who was the first boy you ever dated?"

Clarice looked confused but Sue looked horrified. The cow's eyes glanced towards the lioness and Clarice narrowed her eyes in suspicion. It didn't take a genius to figure out whomever Rita was talking about had a connection to Clarice, one that Sue really didn't want her friend to know about.

"Um... Well... When you say date..."

"Date. As in more than once. As in our senior prom," Rita said.

Sounds like a juicy story, you thought. Hope I get to hear it, cause if not... Well, I really hope Sue tells the truth for Pickles' sake.
143111111.title: Clarice concedes. Now it's Rita's turn.

choices: Trevor was understanding (Clarice calms down, but is grumpy)
They still hang out as friends (Clarice is actually happy for them!)
Trevor didn't take it well (Clarice is FURIOUS!)
1431111111.content:
Sue gulped, eyes darting around the room. The giant heifer gave a hopeful look to Rita, but your mistress just smirked like...well, like she did when she thought up some new way to play with you. You had to admit, the schadenfreude from seeing that look aimed at someone besides you was exquisite. Sue looked to Clarice, but the lioness's glare made it clear she wouldn't get out of this one easily.

Pickles rolled his eyes and mimed looking at a watch.
Lisa saw it and gave a drunken chuckle, even flashing a thumb(claw)-up at the tiny man's silent sarcasm.

"Uh, I'll say truth," Sue finally answered, her voice shaky. "On our senior prom, my date was...Trevor. As in, Clarice's cousin." She winced, then made motions to back away from the lioness.

Clarice was an ocean of calm. Even her smug demeanor had dropped off. "He didn't tell me? Ahem...how did it go, Sue?" She purred quietly.

Even Lisa started to look nervous, moving her glass beer bottle out of either girl's reach. Kelly held her human closer to her chest, and Rita even gave you a worried look. You both look toward the door, wondering if it was about to hit the fan and she'd have to leave for your own safety.

Sue was sweating bullets now, and you even feel sorry for her. "Um, we--*gulp*--danced a lot, and drank a lot of punch. He was kinda shy and nervous, but really sweet. I made sure NOT to mention his last girlfriend after what happened..."

You remembered Rita mentioning that. Trevor had been rather coldly dumped by an elephant girl, and left depressed and sulky afterwards. Clarice had even started acting more antagonistic to Rita than usual after her cousin's heart was broken--a grudge against pachyderms the lioness still hadn't quite shaken off. It had left the smug rich cat oddly protective of her cousin, and suspicious of any girl who dated him.

"And...?" Clarice prodded.

"And we...kissed." Sue finished. "He, uh; really liked it. I did too, heh. But, when we got to talking, I figured we wouldn't be a good match. He...thinks humans are only for eating, that they're bugs. And I couldn't let him near Pickles, so...a few days after prom, I told him he was a great guy, but that it may not work out between us. I didn't mention humans, but I tried to let him down gently."

Silence. None of the giantesses say anything, nor the tiny humans scampering about. All eyes are on Clarice.

"I see. And how did Trevor take this revalation, that you wouldn't stay with him after a good night?" She looked ready to pounce.

Sue swallows, and licks her lips before answering...
1431111111.title: Sue Tells the Truth

14311111113.content:
"He... didn't take it well," Sue mumbled.

"No he didn't!" Clarice hissed. The sight of her anger was terrible to behold. The lioness's hair stood up on end, her teeth and claws were bared, and if looks could kill Sue would've been buried in the backyard already. "The entire summer Trevor was a wreck! I thought it was that elephant hussy who broke his heart, but now I find out one of my best friends stomped all over it and broke it twice over!"

Clarice sprang to her feet and Sue began nervously scooting away on her big behind. She clutched Pickles tight to her chest in terror, her grip so hard the little guy struggled to breathe. He smacked her fingers to get her attention but Sue was too busy retreating from her enraged friend to notice.

"H-hey now, Clarice! B-be r-reasonable! It was a long time ago!"

"Do you know what Trevor was like that summer?!" the lioness roared. "He was inconsolable! He spent three months crying and binge eating! He never lost the weight, he's still the size of a barn! The therapy bills were so high we had to cancel our family vacation! No lounging at the beach with cabana boys for this girl, that summer!"

"All that from one date?" Sue asked, genuinely confused.

Clarice ignored her. "Trevor started a blog and posted poetry that summer, Sue! POETRY! Do you have any idea how much emotional garbage he made me read because of you?! I had to like a post where he said, "My heart is your paper cup/ Drink your fill then throw it away.""

Rita snorted. You would've found it funny too if the atmosphere wasn't so murderous. You were just grateful Sue and Clarice were too distracted to notice.

"You should've been grateful my cousin spared you the time of day, you fat cow! Instead you destroyed him! Now, I'm gonna repay the favor!"

Clarice pounced before Sue could get up. Rita, Kelly and Lisa backed away as the two titans wrestled and rolled across the floor, clawing at each other's hair and cursing. Sue kept Pickles clutched close to protect him from Clarice. The little guy was almost purple from lack of hair. Clarice tore off one of Sue's sleeves. Sue ripped at Clarice's collar, tearing the silk.

"Is it just me or is this kind of hot?" Lisa asked. Rita and Kelly shot her a look. Even Sue and Clarice paused in their fight to scowl at her. Lisa blushed. "Sorry."

Sue and Clarice resumed their fight without further interruption, the two titans thrashing and screaming obscenities at each other. Rita watched with barely concealed enjoyment.
